anya-e1210n:22: Vuttattā sambadho tāva veditabbo. So ca yathāvuttājjhāhāravasena duvidho.
anya-e1210n:24: Tesu –’milido nāma so rājā …pe… sāgaranti etha ajjhāhārasambadho veditabbo yo’pi milido rājā bhagavato parinibbānato pañcavassasate atikkante rājakule uppanno so rājā milido nāma.
anya-e1210n:25: Sāgalāyaṃ puruttame sāgalanāmake uttamanagare rajjaṃ kārento nāgasenatheraṃ upagañchi kiṃ viyā?Ti.
anya-e1210n:26_0: Gaṅgāva yatha sāgaranti āha. Yathā gaṅgā vā yamunādīsu aññatarā vā sāgaraṃ upagañchi
anya-e1210n:26_1: tathā upagañchi’ti atho. Va-saddo vetha samuccayatho. Gaṅgā vā’ti vattabbe ākārassa
anya-e1210n:26_2: rassattaṃ kavā gaṅgāva iti vuttaṃ. Uppalaṃva yathodake’ti etha vuttasamuccayatho vāsaddo viya.
anya-e1210n:27_0: Āsajja rājā …pe… vidāḷane’ti etha yathāvuttasambadho veditabbo. So ca suviñeñayyo’va.
anya-e1210n:27_1: Padanti upasagga nipātanāmaākhyātapadavasena catubbidhaṃ. Tesu nāmapadaṃ sāmaññaguṇa-kittima-opapātika-nāma
anya-e1210n:27_2: vasena catubbidhaṃ. Tatha paṭhamakappikamahājanena sammantivā ṭhapitattā mahāsammato’ti
anya-e1210n:27_3: rañño nāmaṃ sāmañañanāmaṃ nāma. Dhammakathiko paṃsukuliko vinayadharo tepiṭako saddho
anya-e1210n:27_4: pasanno’ti evarūpaṃ guṇato āgataṃ nāmaṃ guṇanāmaṃ nāma. Yampana jātassa kumārassa
anya-e1210n:27_5: nāmagahaṇadivase dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ sakkāraṃ kavā samīpe ṭhitā ñātakā kappevā’ayaṃ amuko
anya-e1210n:27_6: nāmā’ti nāmaṃ karonti idaṃ kittima nāmaṃ nāma. Yā pana purimapaññatti pacchimapaññattiyaṃ
anya-e1210n:27_7: patati, purimavohāro pacchimavohāre seyyathidaṃ purimakappe’pi cado cadoyeva nāma
anya-e1210n:27_8: etarahi’pi cado cadoyeva nāma, atīte sūriyo samuddo pathavī pabbatoyeva nāma. Etarahi’pi
anya-e1210n:27_9: pabbato pabbatoyeva nāmāti idaṃ opapātikanāmaṃ nāma, idaṃ nāmacatukkaṃ abhidhammapariyāyena
anya-e1210n:27_11: pañcavidhaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ idha yathārahaṃ veditabbaṃ. Padatho pana āsajjā’ti
anya-e1210n:29: Suttajālasamathitā’ti suttantapiṭakasaṅkhātasuttasamūhena samathitā pathitā, suttaṃ āharivā suttathavisodhanavasena suttajālasodhakā
anya-e1210n:30: Nayehi cāti abhidhammavinayādīhi nayehi yuttīhi vā.
anya-e1210n:31: Paṇidhāyā cāti abhidhammavinayādīhi nayehi yuttīhi vā.
anya-e1210n:33: Bhāsayivāna mānasanti attano cittaṃ atisayena punappunaṃ pavattāpanavasena hāsevā
anya-e1210n:34: Kaṅkhāṭhānavidāḷane’ti kaṅkhāya vicikicchāya vassā kāraṇabhūtānaṃ avijjādikilesānaṃ dhammānaṃ vidāḷanakāraṇe.
anya-e1210n:39: Sotaṃ patitānaṃ janānaṃ saṃsīdanaṃ rāti ādadātī’ti
anya-e1210n:45: Kaṅkhā ca kaṅkhāṭhānañca kaṅkhāṭhānāni kaṅkhāṭhānānaṃ vidāḷanaṃ
anya-e1210n:48: Imā pañca gāthā kena katā?Ti codanā bhadantabuddhaghosācariyena katā’ti parihāro. Na kevalaṃ pañaca gāthā’va, therarājavacane’pi aññaṃ pubbāparavacanampi tena vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:51: ‘Yena yassa hi sambadho dūraṭṭhampi ca tassa taṃ,
anya-e1210n:57_0: Tīṇī’pi lakkhaṇāni sallakkhevā yathā atho ca sabhāvo ca labbhati, tathā saddappayogo
anya-e1210n:57_1: kātabbo. Saddappayogena hi atthasabhāvā anuvattitabbā, na atthasabhāvehi saddappayogo
anya-e1210n:57_2: api ca ācariyā nānāraṭṭhesu ṭhitā attano attano raṭṭhavohārānurūpena saddappayogassa
anya-e1210n:57_3: athaṃ vadanti. Idha amhākaṃ biṅgaraṭṭhe siliṭṭhavohārānurūpena saddappayogassa atho
anya-e1210n:57_4: vattabbo. Yathā vacanaṃ siliṭṭhaṃ hoti kulaputtānañca hadayaṃ pavisati tathā vattabbo
anya-e1210n:57_5: kathaṃ? Yadi paṭhamā kattā hoti, dutiyā kammaṃ savisesanaṃ paṭhamantakattaṃ vavā
anya-e1210n:57_6: kriyāpadaṃ vattabbaṃ. Kriyāpadaṃ vavā savisesanaṃ dutiyantakammaṃ vattabbaṃ. Yadi
anya-e1210n:57_7: savisesanaṃ paṭhamantapadaṃ kammaṃ hoti taṃ tassa visesanañca vavā tatiyantakattā
anya-e1210n:60: Saddathā vibhajīyanti; Na saddāyeva kevalā’ti ca;
anya-e1210n:65: Ti ca lakkhaṇāni sallakkhevā ekekapadassa athaviggaho vattabbo.
anya-e1210n:67: ‘Dhāvatho hi siyā hetu - paccayatho siyā phalaṃ,
anya-e1210n:69: Sabbavākye kriyāsaddo itisaddo ca hoti hi;
anya-e1210n:72: Ayaṃ amhehi vutto saddappayogaathappayogo yojanānaṃ nayo sabbatha upakāro kulaputtehi uggahetabbo sallakkhetabboyeva.
anya-e1210n:73: Ito paraṃ yaṃ athato ca rūpato ca apākaṭaṃ, taṃyeva vaṇṇayissāma.
anya-e1210n:75: “Racchā ca visikhā vuttā raṭikā vīthi cāpyatha
anya-e1210n:76: Vyuho racchā anibbiddhā nibbiddhā tu pathaddhi ca,
anya-e1210n:78_1: kāsikaraṭṭhe vā uppannaṃ kāsikaṃ. Koṭumbaradese jātaṃ vathaṃ koṭumbaraṃ. Ādisaddena
anya-e1210n:78_2: khomaṃ kappāsikaṃ koseyyaṃ kambalaṃ sāṇaṃ bhaṅganti. Dhavalavathāni ca khomassa anulomabhutaṃ
anya-e1210n:78_3: dukulaṃ koseyyassa anulomabhutāni pattunnapaṭṭa-somāra-cīnaja vathāni ca saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e1210n:79: Dukūlañceva pattunna - pattaṃ somāracīnajaṃ iddhijaṃ devadinnañca tassa tassānulomakanti.
anya-e1210n:80_0: Tassa ṭīkāyañca’vākamayattā dukulā sāṇassa anulomakehi katasuttamayattā pattuṇṇapaṭṭa-somāracīnavathāni
anya-e1210n:80_1: koseyyassa anulomāni iddhijadevadinnavathāni channaṃ vathānaṃ anulomāni tesaṃ aññataramayattā’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:81_0: Tatha milidapañho lakkhaṇapañho vimaticchedanapañho’ti duvidho’ti etha dhammānaṃ
anya-e1210n:81_1: lakkhaṇapucchanavasena pavatto pañho lakkhaṇapañehā.Dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇapañho’ti kathaci
anya-e1210n:81_2: likhitaṃ. Ṭhānuppantikapaṭihāno’ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ gambhīrathavicāraṇakāle kattabbakiccasaṅkhāte
anya-e1210n:81_3: ṭhāne uppatti uppajjanaṃ ṭhānuppatti sā assa athiti ṭhānuppattikaṃ. Ārammaṇe paṭibhātīti
anya-e1210n:81_4: paṭibhānaṃ, ñāṇaṃ. Ṭhānuppattikaṃ paṭibhānaṃ yassa so ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhāno.
anya-e1210n:82_0: Paṭibalo atītānāgatapaccuppannānanti etha athānaṃ jānitunti pāṭhaseso kātabbo soyeva
anya-e1210n:82_1: vā pāṭho. Tatha ahaṃ atītabhave dinnadāno rakkhitasīlo bhāvitabhāvano katakalyāṇo
anya-e1210n:82_2: idāni ñāṇasampanno dhanavā yasavā’ti atītathaṃ jānituṃ paṭibalo idāni mayā dānādi
anya-e1210n:82_3: puññaṃ kattabbaṃ sampatti bhavato. Sampatti bhave uppajjivā sukhī huvā parinibbāyissāmī’ti.
anya-e1210n:83_0: Samantayogavidhānakiriyānaṃ karaṇakāle’ti yuñjitabbo yogo. Samantato sabbato sabbakāle
anya-e1210n:83_1: yogo sabbakālesu sabbakattabbakammānaṃ vidahanaṃ vidhānaṃ nāma. Idañcidañca karissāmi,
anya-e1210n:83_2: imasmiṃ kate idaṃ bhavissatī’ti pubbabhāge upāyena kattabbavidhānaṃ kiriyā nāma karaṇakāleyeva
anya-e1210n:83_3: labbhati. Pubbabhāge ca karaṇakāle ca nisammakārīti adhippāyo.
anya-e1210n:84_0: Seyyathīdanti yāni sathāni tena uggahitāni tāni seyyathidaṃ vibhajissāmīti atho anekathato
anya-e1210n:84_1: mahanidānasuttavaṇṇanāyañca evamevatho vutto’ seyyathidaṃ katamānī’ti keci vadanti.
anya-e1210n:84_2: Taṃ’katame pañcupādānakkhadhā? Seyyathidaṃ? Rūpūpādānakkhadho’tiādinā nayena sameti.
anya-e1210n:85: Sutīti etha suyyate dhammo etāyāti suti, vedo.
anya-e1210n:86: Sammutīti saddagantho. Sesā saṅkhyādayopi ca kattuyonakattā bāhira sathesu yadi dissanti te sugahetabbā yevāti.
anya-e1210n:88_0: Sakiṃ evaṃ cakkhuṃ udapādīti atītabhave tīsu vedesu paricayasatiñāṇabalena sakimeva
anya-e1210n:88_1: ekuggahaṇavārameva cakkhu veduggahañāṇacakkhu udapādi. Bahutaraṃ avacāpevā ekavārameva
anya-e1210n:88_2: vadāpevā dhāretuṃ asakkontassa ñāṇacakkhu udapādīti adhippāyo.
anya-e1210n:89_0: Ācariyassa anuyogaṃ davā’ti’ācariya, tumhehi yaṃ yaṃ icchatha, taṃ taṃ maṃ pucchatha,
anya-e1210n:89_1: ahaṃ vissajessāmi. Byākātuṃ asakkontassa me ācikkhathā’ti ācariyassa attano anuyogaṃ
anya-e1210n:89_2: anuyuñjanaṃ codanaṃ davā. Ekacco hi anuyogaṃ dātuṃ sakkoti byākātuṃ pana na sakkoti.
anya-e1210n:90_0: Dhammacakkhuṃ udapādīti’yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammantidhammacakkhu
anya-e1210n:90_1: sotāpattimaggañāṇaṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ huvā evaṃ uppajjanākārena udapādiyaṃ kiñci saṅkhataṃ
anya-e1210n:90_2: dhammajātaṃ samudayadhammaṃ uppajjanasabhāvaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ
anya-e1210n:90_3: dhammajātaṃ nirujjhanasabhāvaṃ aniccaṃ khayavayadhammanti udapādi. Kasmā nibbānārammaṇaṃyeva
anya-e1210n:91: (Dosinā) dositāti vattabbe takārassa takāraṃ kavā dosinā’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:92: Rathaṃ āruyhā’ti etha sāmikaṃ ramayatīti ratho’ti viggaho kātabbo.
anya-e1210n:94: (Vayahaṃ) vahantī etenāti vayahaṃ uparimaṇḍapasadisapadaracchannasabbamālāguṇṭhimaṃ vā chādevāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena katasakaṭaṃ vayhaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:95: Sadamānikā’ti ubhosu passesu suvaṇṇarajatādimayā gopānasiyo davā garuḷapakkhakanayena sadamānikā’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena kato yānaviseso vayhādidvayaṃ cekathāya idhānītaṃ
anya-e1210n:96_0: Tithakaro’ti’uggaho savaṇaṃ pucchā kathanaṃ dhāraṇaṃ iti pañcadhammavaseneva tithavāso
anya-e1210n:96_1: pavuccatī’ti evaṃ vutte tithavāse patiṭṭhāya pare ca patiṭṭhāpevā piṭakattayatithachekakaraṇena dhammatithaṅkaro.
anya-e1210n:101: Medhāvīti dhammojapaññāya medhāvī. Dhammojapaññā nāya ñānagato paṇḍito’kiṃ sutaṃ kiṃ vā suṇāmi, kiṃ kusalaṃ gavesinti’ yāya vicāreti sā dhammojapaññā nāma.
anya-e1210n:102_0: Āyasmāpi kho nāgaseno paṭisammodi…pe… ārādhesiti yeneva sammodaniyavacanena thero
anya-e1210n:102_1: rañeñā milidassa cittaṃ ārādhesi tosesi teneva sammodanīyavacanena raññā saddhiṃ
anya-e1210n:104: Api ca kho mahārāja …pe… nāgaseno’ti yaṃ idaṃnāgaseno’ti nāmaṃ esā saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmamattaṃ hotīti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:105_0: (Saṅkhā) etha ca saṅkhāyatīti saṅkhā. Saṅkathiyatīti atho kinti saṅkathiyati? Parassāti
anya-e1210n:105_1: attā’ti bhavo’ti poso’ti puggalo’ti naro’ti māṇavo’ti tisso’ti datto’ti mañcapīṭhaṃ
anya-e1210n:105_2: bhisibimbo hananti vihāro pariveṇaṃ dvāraṃ vātapānanti. Evaṃ anekehi ākārehi saṅkathīyatiti saṅkhā.
anya-e1210n:106: Samaññā sammā ñāyatīti kinti ñāyatī?Ti. Ahanti mamanti…pe… dvāraṃ vātapānanti sammā ñāyatīti samaññā.
anya-e1210n:108_0: (Vohāro). Kinti paññāpīyatīti…pe… voharīyatīti vohāro. Kinni voharīyatiti. Ahanti
anya-e1210n:108_1: mamanti…pe… dvāraṃ vātapātanti voharīyatīti vohāro. Imehi catuhi saṅkhāādīhi padehī
anya-e1210n:109: Sace vaṃ mahārāja paṇḍitavādā sallapissasīti vaṃ sace mayā saddhiṃ paṇḍitānaṃ sallāpena.
anya-e1210n:110_0: Āveṭhanampi kayirati nibbeṭhanampi kayiratī’ti pañhapūcchanavasena veṭhanaṃ paṇḍitehi
anya-e1210n:110_1: kayirati pañhavissajjanavasena veṭhanaṃ paṇḍitehi kayirati pañhavissajjanavasena
anya-e1210n:111_0: Niggaho’pi kayiratī’ti nāgasenathero musābhaṇatītiādinā niggahanayena aññapaṇḍitānaṃ
anya-e1210n:111_1: niggahaṇavacanaṃ aññapaṇḍitehi kayirati. Api ca kathāvathuppakaraṇe āgato sabbaniggaho niggahoyeva.
anya-e1210n:112: Paṭikkamampī’ti vaṃ mahārāja’rājā milido jambudīpe aggarājā kasmā musā bhaṇasī’tiādinā paṭikkamampi kayirati.
anya-e1210n:113_0: Viseso ‘pīti’sampannaṃ munino cittaṃ, ‘kammanā byattattena ca vijjācaraṇasampannaṃ
anya-e1210n:113_1: dhammagatānaṃ pasaṃsatī’tiādinā guṇapasaṃsanasaṅkhāta viseso. Idha pana kallo’si
anya-e1210n:113_2: bhante’tiādi paṭiggahaṇaviseso’ti’sampannaṃ munino cittaṃ…pe… dhammagatānaṃ anumodasī’tiādinā
anya-e1210n:113_3: guṇapasaṃsanasaṅkhāto paṭiggahaṇaviseso. Idha pana sādhu kho vaṃ mahārāja rathaṃ
anya-e1210n:113_4: jānāsī’tiādi. Ekaṃ vathuṃ paṭijānantīti kalyāṇamaṇiādikaṃ aññataraṃ ekaṃ vathuṃ kalyāṇaṃ
anya-e1210n:113_5: vā athi nathiti paṭijānanti paṭhamadivase tayo pañhā raññā pucchitā nāmapaññattipañho
anya-e1210n:114_0: Bhante nāgasena pucchissāmīti …pe… kimpana mahārāja tayā pucchitanti tatiyo vīmaṃsanapañho
anya-e1210n:114_2: Tatha’pucchito me bhante’ti idaṃ raññā attanā heṭṭhā pucchite dve pañhe sadhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:115: Vissajjitaṃ me’ti idampi therena attanā heṭṭhā vissajjite dve pañhe sadhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:116_0: Nāgaseno nāgaseno’ti sajjhāyaṃ karonto pakkāmīti raññā nāgasenathere bahumānagāravo
anya-e1210n:116_1: kato’ti dīpetuṃ buddhaghosācariyena vuttaṃ agāravo hi puggalo garuṭṭhāniyaṃ puggalaṃ
anya-e1210n:116_2: disvāpi suvāpi jānivāpi apassanto asuṇanto ajānanto viya hotīti. Tatrāyaṃ vacanatho?
anya-e1210n:116_3: Āguṃ pāpaṃ na karotīti nāgo. Senti sayanti etena vādapaccathikā janāti seno nāgo
anya-e1210n:116_4: ca so seno cāti nāgaseno sāmaññādīsu catusu nāmesu idaṃ kittimanāmaṃ.
anya-e1210n:117: Suṭṭhu thero ababhanumodīti’sādhu suṭṭhu’ti vacanena. Antarāmagge pucchito anathakālapañho.
anya-e1210n:118: Katametha nāgaseno’ti katamo dhammo etasmiṃ vacane nāgaseno nāma hotīti pucchi.
anya-e1210n:120_0: Assāsapassāsā nāmete kāyasaṅkhāro’ti thero abhidhammakathaṃ akāsīti iminā anantakāyassa
anya-e1210n:120_1: ete anto-pavisana-bahi-nikkhamatavātā assāsapassasā nāma karajakāyena abhisaṅkharīyanti,
anya-e1210n:120_2: tasmā kāyasaṅkhārā ca honti, teneva jīvena nāgaseno nāgaseno’ti iminā nāmamattaṃ
anya-e1210n:120_3: gaṇhāti na puggalo jīvo gahetabbo’ti thero abhidhammakathaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1210n:121_0: Upāsakattaṃ pavedesī’ti attasanniyyātanena sissabhāvūpagamanena paṇipātena samādānenāti
anya-e1210n:121_1: catusu saraṇagamanūpāyesu samādānena ratanattayassa ca therassa ca upāsakabhāvaṃ,
anya-e1210n:121_2: buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, tañca
anya-e1210n:121_3: saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, upāsakaṃ maṃ dhārehi ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatanti.
anya-e1210n:123_0: Kimhi hoti kathāsallāpo’ti kimhi kāraṇe nimittabhute kathāsallāpo hoti. Kimpayojano
anya-e1210n:123_1: kathāsallāpo’ti adhippāyo idaṃ rañañā kimathāya vuttaṃ? Anuyogadānathāya ceva pucchanassa
anya-e1210n:124: Athena mayaṃ mahārāja athikā athena hotu kathāsallapo’ti iminā thero rañño anuyogañceva okāsañca deti tatha athenā’ti.
anya-e1210n:127_0: Evaṃ vuttesu athesu idha payojanañca hitañca labbhati. Tesu lokiyalokuttaraphalaṃ
anya-e1210n:127_1: payojanaṃ nāma, sāsanavuddhi vā. Yathicchitaphalanipphādāno hinoti pavattatīti hitaṃ.
anya-e1210n:128: Kintī’ti kimhi asaṅkhatadhātusaṅkhāte nibbāne phalasaṅkhāte nibbāne idaṃ paccuppannadukkhaṃ nirujjheyya.
anya-e1210n:132: Kallo’sīti byākaraṇa ñāṇena cheko’si, aṅguttaraṭīkāyaṃ’ byākaraṇe samatho’. Paṭibalo’tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati yevāti.
anya-e1210n:136: Yoniso manasikārenāti aniccaṃ dukkhanti upāyena pathena sāraṇalakkhaṇena ārammaṇapaṭipādakamanasikārena.
anya-e1210n:138: Ussahanalakkhaṇe’ti sampayuttānaṃ ārammaṇe saṃyojanavasena ussahanalakkhaṇe gaṇhanalakkhaṇe vā.
anya-e1210n:140_0: Yo sīlakkhadho varapātimokkhiyo’ti yo pātimokkhasīlasaṃvarasaṅkhāto buddhuppādeyeva
anya-e1210n:140_1: uppanno sīlaguṇo sayaṃ patiṭṭhāti iduyādīnaṃ ekadasannaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ nissayākārena
anya-e1210n:140_2: nissayapaccayo ceva balavakāraṇaṭṭhena upanissayo ca pathavī iva sattānaṃ patiṭṭhā.
anya-e1210n:142: Aññesaṃ cittaṃ vimuttaṃ passivā’ti aññesaṃ ariyānaṃ sotāpattiphalādike phale visesena adhimuttaṃ pakkhadantaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā passivā.
anya-e1210n:144: Sabbe kusalā dhammā’ti sabbe lokiyakusaladhammā uppannā na parihāyanti.
anya-e1210n:146: Apilāpanalakkhaṇo’ti ārammaṇe anupavisanaṭṭhena ogāhanalakkhaṇo sappaṭibhāgadhammo’ti paṭibhāgena paccathikena saha vattantīti sappaṭibhāgā sukko ca kaṇhapaṭibhāgena sappaṭibhāgo.
anya-e1210n:150: Sabbathakanti sabbakicce niyuttaṃ sabbalīnudhaccesu icchitabbaṃ vā.
anya-e1210n:154: Yo uppajjati so eva so’ti yo pathaviphassādiparamathadhammo uppajjati, so uppannapubbadhammo eva.
anya-e1210n:158_0: Vaṃ pana bhante evaṃ vutte kiṃ vadeyyāsī’ti yadā vaṃ daharo taruṇo mado uttānaseyyako
anya-e1210n:158_1: ahosi soyeva vaṃ etarahi mahanto’ti imasmiṃ vacane mayā ca kenavidha pucchanavasena
anya-e1210n:164_0: Nibbisaṃ bhatako yathā’ti yathā bhatako bhatakakammaṃ kavā lakkhaṃ nibbisaṃ nibbisanto
anya-e1210n:164_1: labhanto dukkhaṃ jīvituṃ nābhinadati maraṇañca nābhinadati maraṇakālaṃ āgameti, evamevāhaṃ
anya-e1210n:166_0: Yadi kusalā na dukkhā’ti sukhā vedanā kusalā yadi siyā sā kusalā vedanā na dukkhabhūtā.Yadi
anya-e1210n:166_1: siyā sā kusalā na hoti. Kusalaṃ dukkhanti na upapajjatī’ti kusalaṃ dukkhabhutanti
anya-e1210n:166_2: vacanaṃ na upapajjatīti vattuṃ na yujjati. Kusalaṃ dukkhaṃ na. Aññamaññapaccanīkattā’ti
anya-e1210n:166_3: rañño adhippāyo. Sabhāvo pana evaṃ na hoti. Kusalā hi sukhā vedanā saṅkhāradukkhena
anya-e1210n:166_5: kusalā siyāti thero pana mayi rājānaṃ ayoguḷahimapiṇḍapañhaṃ pucchante taṃ rājā micchā
anya-e1210n:166_6: byākarissati. Tasmiṃ dosaṃ āropessāmi. Rājā taṃ micchā byākarissati. Tasmiṃ dosaṃ
anya-e1210n:166_7: āropessāmi. Rājā taṃ harituṃ asakkonto maṃ athajappanaṃ yācissati. Atha rājātaṃ sabhāvathaṃ
anya-e1210n:166_8: saññāpessāmīti manvā taṃ kimmaññasi mahārājā’tiādimāha. Kinnu kho mahārāja ubho’pi
anya-e1210n:166_9: te daheyyunti imasmiṃ pucchāvacane therena vutte rājā sītuṇhasamaññātā tejodhātu’ti
anya-e1210n:166_10: sutattā sītahimapiṇḍassa kharakhādanabhāvañca sadhāya dhātunaṃ ussadabhāvajānanañāṇato
anya-e1210n:166_11: virujjhivā’āma bhante ubho’pi te daheyyunti viruddhapaṭivacanaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1210n:168_0: Ajānāhi niggahanti theravacanaṃ. Yasmā te purimāya’āmā’ti paṭiññāya pacchimā’na hi
anya-e1210n:168_1: bhante’ti paṭiññā pacchimāya ca purimā na sadhiyatī. Tasmā vaṃ niggahaṃ patto. Vaṃ
anya-e1210n:168_2: niggahaṃ dosaṃ aparādhaṃ sampiṭicchāhī’ti atho. Idāni ubhinnaṃ tattābhāvadassanavasena
anya-e1210n:168_3: ubhinnaṃ sītalābhāvadassanavasena ca taṃ niggahaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto yadi tattaṃ dahatī’tiādimāha.
anya-e1210n:169: Tatha– ‘yadi tattaṃ dahatī’ti sace ubhinnaṃ tattatā dahati. Yadi tattaṃ dahatī’ti ca ṭhapanavacanaṃ.
anya-e1210n:171: Tena na uppajjatī’ti tena tasmiṃ ubhinnaṃ uṇhabhāvakāraṇā ubho’pete dahanti’ti vacanaṃ tattabhāvassa dahane na upapajjati, na yujjati.
anya-e1210n:172_0: Yadi sītalaṃ dahatīti sace ubhinnaṃ sītalabhāvo dahati tena na upapajjatī’ti tasmā
anya-e1210n:172_1: kāraṇā ubhinnaṃ sītalābhāvakāraṇā ubho’pi te dahanti’ti vacanaṃ sītalabhāvassa dahanena
anya-e1210n:172_2: na upapajjatī’ti vattuṃ na yujjati puna taṃ dosaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karonto thero kissa
anya-e1210n:174_0: Tena na upapajjatīti kena tasmā kāraṇā ekassa uṇhassa ekassa sītalassa bhāvakāraṇā
anya-e1210n:174_1: ubhopi te dahantī’ti tayā vuttavacanaṃ na upapajjati na vaṭṭati. Ubhopi te dahantīti
anya-e1210n:174_2: vuttaṃ, ayuttampi tayā vuttameva. Kusalaṃ dukkhanti vattuṃ vuttameva kusalaṃ dukkhanti
anya-e1210n:174_3: na upapajjatīti idaṃ vaṃ kasmā vadasi? Vattuṃ yuttavacanaṃ na yujjatīti vadasi vattuṃ
anya-e1210n:174_4: ayuttavacanaṃ yujjatīti vadasīti therassa vacanena attano vāde dosaṃ passanto taṃ
anya-e1210n:174_5: pariharituṃ asakkonto nīvamano theraṃ athajappanaṃ yācanto’nāhaṃ paṭibalo’tiādimāha.
anya-e1210n:176: Sādhū athaṃ jappehī tī sādhu yācāmi. Sukhā vedanā kusalāti vā akusalā abyākatāti vā imassa mayā pucchitavacanassa athaṃ jappehi desehi athenāhaṃ athiko, kiṃ vivādenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e1210n:185_0: So ca aññapañhehi gambhīrataro, kulaputtehi mayā vuttaathamattena santosaṃ kavā attano
anya-e1210n:185_1: paññānubhāvena ca punappunaṃ cintevā pubbāparaṃ sallakkhevā yo mayā vuttaathato yuttaro
anya-e1210n:186_0: Nāmarūpanti nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena namanaṭṭhena cattāro arūpino khadhā nāmaṃ. Idha vipākanāmaṃ
anya-e1210n:186_1: adhippetaṃ sītādīhi ruppanaṭṭhena rūpaṃ nippariyāyato channavutirūpakoṭṭhāsasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e1210n:186_3: satta dasakā, citta utu-āhārajaaṭṭhakā tayo, cittaja utujasaddavasena dve saddā’ti
anya-e1210n:187_0: Tena kammena aññaṃ nāmarūpaṃ paṭisadahatīti tena kusalākusalakammena aññaṃ nāmarūpaṃ
anya-e1210n:187_1: aññaṃ anāgatanāmarūpaṃ sugatiduggatipariyāpannaṃ iminā paccuppannanāmarūpena saddhiṃ paṭisadahati.
anya-e1210n:188: Purimaṃ bhante ambabījaṃ bhūtaṃ mūlakāraṇabhūtaṃ apaccakkhāya avijahivā nibbattena pacchimena ambena puriso daṇaḍappatto bhaveyyāti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:191: Adhikāranti mahantaṃ pūjāsakkāraṃ. Ayaṃ sattamopañho puna pucchate. Upamaṃ sotukāmatāvasena puna pucchito’ti ñātabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:197: Pathaviyā cakkaṃalikhivā’ti bhamacakkaṃ punappunaṃ parivattanavasena ā bhuso likhivā.
anya-e1210n:199_0: Khadhā ca dukkhassa bījātīti paṭisadhibhutā badhā kevalassa sakalassa pavattidukkharāsissa
anya-e1210n:199_1: mulakāraṇabhāvena bījāni evaṃ khaṇakoṭisaṅkhātapaṭisadhibadhato pavatti dukkhavaḍḍhanaṃ
anya-e1210n:201_0: Cakkhusmiñca kho mahārāja sati rūpesu ca cakkhuviññāṇaṃ hotīti etha abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāpariyāyena
anya-e1210n:201_1: ekato sahajātesu bahūsu cakkhuppasādesu yaṃ cakkhu visaditaṃ taṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa
anya-e1210n:201_2: nissayapaccayo. Cakkhusmiñcāti ekavacanadassanato. Rūpesu cā’ti bahuvacanassa dassanato
anya-e1210n:201_3: pana bahūnipi rūpāni cakkhuviññāṇassa purejātapaccayo paccayabhāva. Visesa-sabhāvatoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e1210n:203: Bhavantāyeva kho mahārāja saṅkhārā jāyantiti etha antappaccayo atīte hoti. Atīte bhūtā’ti atho.
anya-e1210n:204: Ayañca gāthā’ti sadisagāthā. Ahuvā sambhotīti ca gāthā khaṇikagāthā’ti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañhi pubbāparaṃ sameti.
anya-e1210n:209: Phusanalakkhaṇo’ti cittārammaṇaphusanalakkhaṇo. Yathā cakkhu’ti etha cakkhuppasādo’pi cakkhuviññāṇampi labbhati.
anya-e1210n:210_0: Saṅghaṭṭanaraso’ti imesaṃ vathārammaṇānaṃ saṅghaṭṭanaraso sampatti etassā ta atho
anya-e1210n:210_1: labbhati. Yadā cakkhuviññāṇampi labbhati. Tadā cittārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanaraso kiccaṃ
anya-e1210n:210_2: etasseti atho labbhati. Saṅghaṭṭanaraso’ti ca pañcadvārikaphasse labbhati. Na manodvārikaphasse’ti
anya-e1210n:216: Vaḍḍhakī suparikammakataṃ dāruṃ sadhismiṃ appetīti vaḍḍhakī jano suṭṭhuparikammakataṃ dāruṃ sadhismiṃ appeti pāpeti paveseti.
anya-e1210n:219: Cuddasapañhavanto tatiyavaggo samatto. Vinibbhujivā vinibabhujivā’ti aññamaññāto visuṃ visuṃ kavā vibhajivā vibhajivā.
anya-e1210n:221: Nanu loṇameva āharitabbanti sakaṭehi suddhaloṇameva balivaddehi āharitabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:222: Na sakkā mahārāja loṇameva āharitunti pāṭhena bhavitabbanti nakāro pothake dissati.
anya-e1210n:223: Loṇapañho dutiyo, rañño dhammalakkhaṇesu daḷhapatiṭṭhāpanathaṃ therena paṭhamaṃ vutto.
anya-e1210n:225_0: Catuthavagge nānākammehi mahārāja nibbattāni na ekena kammenā’ti āpāyikasattānaṃ
anya-e1210n:225_2: nānākusalakammehi ekena kammena ekena paṭisadhijanakakammeneva nibbattāni. Abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāyaṃ
anya-e1210n:225_3: paṭisadhikkhaṇe mahaggatacetanā kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo’ti vacanena
anya-e1210n:225_4: paṭisadhikkhaṇe vijjamānānaṃ sabbesaṃyeva kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayo hotīti viññāyati.
anya-e1210n:225_5: Nānācetanāhi tadā idriyuppattiyaṃ sati atiparittena ca mahaggatena ca kammena nibbattaṃ
anya-e1210n:225_6: kaṭattārūpaṃ āpajjeyya, na cekā paṭisadhi anekammanibbattā hotī’ti.’Saddhiṃ ekena
anya-e1210n:225_7: kammena anekidirayuppatti hotī’ti vuttaṃ. Vicārevā yaṃ yuttataraṃ taṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:226_0: Mahaggatasattānaṃ idriyāni ekena paṭisadhijanakakammena nibbattāni. Nāgasenathero
anya-e1210n:226_1: pana arahā khīṇāsavo buddhamataññu tassa adhippāyānurūpena kāmāvacarakasattānaṃ nānākammehi
anya-e1210n:228_0: Mahākulīnatāti uccakulīnatā. Soyeva vā pāṭho. Ābādha-vaṇṇa-sukkha-bhoga-kulīnaṃ paññakā
anya-e1210n:228_1: ete cuddasa pañhā’pi subhasutte pakāsitā’ti ayaṃ gāthā sukhavācuggatakaraṇathaṃ porāṇehi vuttā.
anya-e1210n:230: Kiṃ paṭigacceva vāyamitenā’ti pubbe vāyāmena saha pavattakammena vāyāmakaraṇena kiṃ payojanaṃ athi?
anya-e1210n:231: Akiccakaro’ti etha yathicchitaphalasaṅkhātaṃ kiccaṃ na karotīti akiccakaro. Ayañca ayuttasamāso. Saddhaṃ matakabhojanaṃ na bhuñjatīti asaddhabhojitiādiko viyā’ti.
anya-e1210n:235: So na tāva kālaṃ karotīti tāva tattakaṃ so nerayikasatto kālaṃ maraṇaṃ na karoti. Kammādhikatenā’ti pubbe adhikatena kammena mūlakāraṇabhutena.
anya-e1210n:240: Abhiññeyye dhamme’ti abhivisiṭṭhena catusaccañāṇena jānitabbe dhamme, catusaccadhamme.
anya-e1210n:246_0: Sakkā jānituṃ buddho anuttaro’ti idaṃ raññā’bhagavā buddho anuttaro’ti theraṃ pubbe
anya-e1210n:246_1: pucchitaṃ. Puna kasmā vuttaṃ? Pubbapañho therassa vijānanaṃ sadhāya pucchitaṃ pucchāpañho
anya-e1210n:246_2: sabbapañho therassa vijānanaṃ sadhāya pucchitaṃ. Pucchāpañho sabbapaṇḍitānaṃ jānanaṃ
anya-e1210n:248: Buddhanettīyā’ti nibbānaṃ neti etāya sadevake loke’ti netti, suttantābhidhammapāli.
anya-e1210n:249: (Buddhapaññatti) paññāyapīyati etāya bhagavato āṇā’ti paññatti. Buddhassa paññatti buddhapaññatti, vinayapāli.
anya-e1210n:250_0: Yāvajīvaṃ sāvakehi vattitabbanti idaṃ therena’āma mahārāja dhammo mayā diṭṭho’ti
anya-e1210n:250_1: avissajjevā kasmā vuttaṃ? Rājā therassa dhammadassanabhāvaṃ paccakkhato ñavā vicitrapaṭibhānaṃ
anya-e1210n:250_2: sotukāmo pucchati, na jānanathāya thero tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñavā evamāha. Adiṭṭhadhammo
anya-e1210n:250_3: hi buddhanettiyā buddhapaññattiyā yāvajīvaṃ vattituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e1210n:253_0: Vedagu upalabbhatīti ayampañho pubbe ca pucchito. Kasmā puna pucchito? Pubbapañho
anya-e1210n:253_1: jīvavedaguṃ sadhāya pucchito. Ayaṃ’ye brāhmaṇā vedagu’tiādinā vuttaṃ puggalavedaguṃ
anya-e1210n:253_2: sadhāya pucchito. Save thero’na upalabbhatī’ti byākarissati, tassa vāde dosaṃ āropetukāmatāya
anya-e1210n:253_3: pucchati. Thero pana vijjamānena avijjamānapaññattiṃ sadhāya’paramathena kho mahārāja
anya-e1210n:253_4: vedagu na upalabbhatī’ti āha. Paramathena na upalabbhati, vohārato upalabbhatī’ti therassa adhippāyo.
anya-e1210n:255: Na kho-pe tena ropitāniti tāni ambāni avahāriyāni tāni ambāni purisena avaharitāni tena sāmikapurisena ropitāni ropitaambabhutāni na hontiti atho
anya-e1210n:261: Samantato paggharatīti ayaṃ kho guthamuttādīhi asucivathūhi samantato paggharāpeti.
anya-e1210n:264_1: āgataṃ. Taṃ pākaṭaṃ asītyanubañjanasurūpaṃ na pākaṭaṃ jinālaṅkāraṭīkāyaṃyeva āgataṃ.
anya-e1210n:264_2: Tasmā taṃ dassayissāma. Katamāni asītyānubyañjananāni? Citaṅgulitā, anupubbaṅgulitā,
anya-e1210n:264_3: vaṭṭaṅgulitā, tambanakhatā, tuṅganakhatā, siniddhanakhatā, niguḷhagopphakatā, samapādatā,
anya-e1210n:264_9: gattatā, tuṅganāsatā, susaṇṭhānanāsatā, rattadvijamaṃsatā, susukkadantatā, suvisuddhidriyatā,
anya-e1210n:264_14: susaṇṭhānabhamukatā, kaṇhabhamukatā, sukhumālagattatā, ativiya ujjalitagattatā, ativiyasommagattatā,
anya-e1210n:264_15: ativimalagattatā, komalagattatā, siniddhagattatā, sugadhatanutā, samalomatā, atisukhumaassāsapassāsadhāraṇatā,
anya-e1210n:271_0: Evañhi bhante nāgasena sabbā sati abhijānantī uppajjati nathi kaṭumikā satīti evaṃ
anya-e1210n:271_1: mayā cintanākāre sabbā sati abhijānantī sayaṃ pākaṭā parūpadesarahitā uppajjati,
anya-e1210n:271_2: kaṭumikā parinibbajjana-parūpadesa-saṅkhātā kaṭumasahitā sati nathiti atho.
anya-e1210n:274_1: Olārikaviññāṇato’ti mahante ārammaṇe pavattaviññāṇato. Ahitaviññāṇato’ti dukkhasaṅkhātaahite
anya-e1210n:274_4: goṇa-sakaṭa-danta-piḷakādilakkhaṇato. Saraṇato’ti parehi sarāpanato muddāto’ti akkharasikkhanato.
anya-e1210n:274_6: Anubhūtato’ti channaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ anubhutapubbato. Nibadhantī’ti pīḷenti. Lipiyā
anya-e1210n:288_0: Nathi dutiyaṃ paññāya chedananti yaṃ chedanaṃ paññāya saddhiṃ dvayaṃ taṃ chedanaṃ
anya-e1210n:288_1: nathiti atho. Chedanapañho cuddasamo. Bhutajivapañho pannarasamo. Dukkarapañho soḷasamo
anya-e1210n:288_2: therena paṭhamaṃ vutto. Soḷasapañhasahito sattamo vaggo.
anya-e1210n:289: Sampati kā velā’ti idāni kā velā sampattā’ti yojanā. Gamissantiti tayā saddhiṃ gamissanti. Bhaṇḍato bhaṇḍāgārato. Rājadeyyānīti rājasantakāni.
anya-e1210n:290_0: Tassa pañhaveyyākaraṇena tuṭṭhe rājā’ti tassa nāgasenatherassa asītipañhaveyyākaraṇena
anya-e1210n:290_1: tuṭṭho rājā. Abbhantarakathāyañhi aṭṭhāsīti pañhā paṭhamadivase visajjitā. Tayo divase
anya-e1210n:290_2: pāsāde bhattakiccato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamayāmāvasānā aṭṭhāsīti pañhā visajjitā ahesuṃ.
anya-e1210n:291: Bāhirakathāpañhā tayo. Tena saddhiṃ ekanavuti pañhā honti.
anya-e1210n:294: Meṇḍakapañhe pana bhassappavādīti vohārakusalatāya yuttavacanasaṅkhātabhassavadanasīlo. Vetaṇaḍīti theravādena saddhiṃ viruddhavacanavadanasīlo.
anya-e1210n:295_1: tassa’ medhāvī amatābhimukho’ti evaṃ vuttehi sobhaggaguṇehi samannāgato tassa therassa
anya-e1210n:295_3: Tāni hi therassa karuṇāñāṇaṃ nāmakāyato pavattanti pakatisarīrato pavattachāyā viya hotī tī.
anya-e1210n:296_0: Addakkhi meṇḍake pañhe’ti ñāṇacakkhunā meṇḍake gambhīre pañhe addakkhi. Athavā senakādibhāsitabbaṃ
anya-e1210n:296_1: anekapariyāyabhāvena ceva abhutabhāvena ca meṇaḍakapañhasadise. Athavā dvīvacanavantattā
anya-e1210n:297_0: Pariyāya bhāsitaṃ athi’ti’ānada, mayādve’pi vedanā vuttā pariyāyenā’tiādikaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ
anya-e1210n:297_1: athi. Kathaṃ imissā pariyāyanippariyāyadesanābhāvo jānitabbo? Upekkhāvedanā hi santamiṃ
anya-e1210n:297_2: paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatā’ti ayaṃ hetha pariyāyo.
anya-e1210n:298_0: Sabhāvabhāsitaṃ athiti’tisso iha bhikkhave vedanā sukhā dukkhā upekkhā vedanā’tiādikaṃ
anya-e1210n:298_1: nippariyāyavacanaṃ athi. Kathaṃ nippariyāyabhāvo jānitabbo? Vedanāsabhāvo hi tividho’ti
anya-e1210n:299_0: Sadhāyabhāsitanti’tīhi bhikkhave ṭhānehi jambudīpikā manussā deve tāvatiṃse uttarakuruke
anya-e1210n:299_1: ca manusse adhigaṇhanti. Katamehi tīhi? Sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso’tiādikaṃ
anya-e1210n:299_2: sadhāya bhāsitaṃ athi.’Idha brahmacariyavāso’ti idaṃ pabbajjābrahmacariyavāsanaṃ
anya-e1210n:299_3: vuttaṃ na maggabrahmacariyavāsaṃ. Neyyathanītathavacanaṃ idha anāgataṃ. Tampi āharivā
anya-e1210n:299_4: dassetabbaṃ.’Yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhanti’ādikaṃ nyethavacanaṃ.’Sukhāpi
anya-e1210n:299_5: kho vedanā aniccā saṅkhatā’tiādikaṃ yathārutavasena jānitabbaṃ nītathavacanaṃ athīti.
anya-e1210n:303: Sallakkhevāna taṃ sabbaṃ athaṃ vadetha paṇḍito’ti;
anya-e1210n:304: Na rahassakaṃ kātabbanti athapaṭicchannavacanaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:305: Garukaṃ pariṇamatīti garubhāvena paripākaṃ gacchati dadhabhāvena pākaṭo hotiti adhippāyo.
anya-e1210n:311: Snehasaṃsevā’ti piyapuggalasaṃsevanavasena. Mantisahāyo’ti mantī vicāraṇapañño sahāyo etassāti mantisahāyo.
anya-e1210n:312_0: Mā hāyi atho te abhikkamatīti attānuvādādibhaye uppanne vaṃ ettakena kāraṇena mā
anya-e1210n:312_1: bhāyi. Katapuñño katabhīruttāṇo ñāṇasampannosammāpayoge ṭhito na cirasseva lokiyalokuttararatho
anya-e1210n:313: Allāpo’ti paṭhamāmantānā’ti keci vadanti. Raṭṭhakavacanaṃ āmantanā.
anya-e1210n:315: Khalite dhammena paggahetabbo’ti sammāpaṭipattito vā yuttavacanato vā khalite antevāsikamhi dhammena sabhāvena taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ vavā sīlādiguṇesu paggahetabbo.
anya-e1210n:317: Abhivaḍḍhiyā vāyamatī’ti pariyattipaṭipattisāsanānaṃ abhivaḍḍhanathāya catupaccayadānādinā upāyena vāyāmaṃ karoti.
anya-e1210n:322: Akuho na varo cakke buddhādisaraṇaṃ gato
anya-e1210n:326: Chaṭṭhaṃ tu garupādānaṃ sesā aniyamā matā’ti;
anya-e1210n:330_1: sabbadassāvī dasabalasamannāgato catuhi vesarajjehi samananāgato pabhinnapaṭisambhido
anya-e1210n:330_2: chaḷabhiñño ca asādhāraṇañāṇo aṭṭhārasabuddhadhammasamannāgato, tassa arahattamagagañāṇaṃ
anya-e1210n:332: Nippabhā jātā kutithiyā vaṃ gaṇīvarapavaramāsajjāti kutithiyā micchādiṭṭhikā vaṃ bhadantaṃ gaṇivarapavaraṃ gaṇivarehi paraṃ seṭṭhaṃ āsajja pavā nippabhā nijjotā bhaveyyunti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:334_0: Vāhasataṃ kho mahārāja vīhīnaṃ aḍḍhucūḷañca vāhā vīhī sattammaṇāni dve ca tumbā ekaccharakkhaṇe
anya-e1210n:334_1: pavattavittassa ettakāvihīti lakkhaṃ ṭhapīyamānā parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyyunti
anya-e1210n:334_2: etha sādikadiyaḍḍhavāhasataṃ thokena uddhaṃ upaḍḍhāvāhasatassa patanālike tumbo’ti
anya-e1210n:334_3: aṅguttaraṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Aḍḍhacūḷanti vāhassa tassa aḍḍhādhikā vāhavīhī’tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
anya-e1210n:335: ‘Kuḍubo pasato eko patho te caturo siyuṃ
anya-e1210n:336: Āḷhako caturo pathā doṇaṃ vā caturāḷhakaṃ,
anya-e1210n:338: Khāriyo vīsa vāho’tha siyā tumbo dasammaṇaṃ
anya-e1210n:339: Āḷahako nithiyaṃ tumbo patho tu nāḷi nāriyaṃ,
anya-e1210n:340: Vāho tu sakaṭo ceko dasa doṇā tu ammaṇa’nti;
anya-e1210n:341_0: Abhidhānappadipikāyaṃ vutto sakaṭapapamāṇo vāho’ti vinayaṭīkāyampana’ dve sakaṭā
anya-e1210n:341_1: vāhā eko vāho’ti vuttaṃ. Vihīnaṃ vāhasatañca aḍḍhacūlañca vāhasatassa aḍaḍhañaca
anya-e1210n:341_2: cūḷaṃ aḍaḍhato thokena ūnaṃ vā hoti. Yathāvuttavāhato adhikāni vīhisattammaṇāni vīhīnaṃ
anya-e1210n:341_3: satta ammaṇāni dve ca tumbā hontī’ti yojanā. Vīhīnaṃ sādhikadiyaḍḍhavāhasatanti adhippāyo.
anya-e1210n:342_0: Ekaccharakkhaṇe pavattacittassā’ti imassa lakkhanti iminā sambadho. Lakkhanati ci
anya-e1210n:342_1: gahaṇasallakkhaṇathaṃ sampadānathe cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ’ divāvihāraṃ pāvisī’ti divāvihārathāya
anya-e1210n:342_2: pāvisitiādisu viya. Lakkhasaddo ca lakkhaṇavācako. Vuttañhetaṃ abhidhānasathe.
anya-e1210n:344: Ciṇhañcāpi tu sobhā tu paramā susamā’tha cā’ti;
anya-e1210n:345: Parikkhayaṃ pariyādānanti khīṇabhāvaṃ gaccheyyuṃ. Iminā dasādhikadiḍḍhavāhasatavīhito adhikāniekaccharakkhaṇe pavattacittānī’ti dasseti.
anya-e1210n:346: Evaṃ ekaccharakkhaṇe pavattacittassa ettakavīhito anekabhāvaṃ dassevā idāni ekaccharakkhaṇe pavattacittassa puggalavisesavasena visesabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ tatrīme’tiādimāha.
anya-e1210n:349: Ime sattavidhā cittā pavattantīti imāni sattavidhāni cittāni pavattanti.
anya-e1210n:352: Tīsu ṭhānesu’ti sakkāyadiṭṭhi-vicikicchā-sīlabbataparāmāsa samugghāṭitaṭṭhānavasena tīsu ṭhānesu. Uparibhumīsu’ti sakadāgāmiādīnaṃ pañcakkhadhasaṅkhāta uparibhumisu?
anya-e1210n:353: Pañcasu ṭhānesu’ti heṭṭhā vuttesu tīsu ṭhānesu rāgadosatanuṭṭhānadvayaṃ pakkhipivā pañca ṭhānāni veditabbāni.
anya-e1210n:354_0: Dasasu ṭhānesu’ti heṭṭhā pañcaṭṭhānāni ceva gahitaggahaṇanayena sakkāyadiṭṭhi-vicikicchā-sīlabbataparāmāsa-lobha-vyāpāda-saṅkhāta-pa-
anya-e1210n:354_2: Aparāti pañcā’ti dasa ṭhānāni vipassanāya ārammaṇabhutā pañcupādānakkhadhā yevāti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:357: Tathā’ti bhagavato lahukaparivattane. Uttarikāraṇa’nti yamakapāṭihāriyato uttariyaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e1210n:358: Tampi mahārāja pāṭihiranti tamabhagavato aggikkhadha-udakadhārā-pavattana-saṅkhāta-yamakapāṭihīraṃ attano paresaṃ rāgādipaccanīkaharaṇato pāṭihiraṃ.
anya-e1210n:361: Chakoṭṭhāse kate kappe’ti catusaṭṭhiantarakappapamāṇe vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyikappe chakoṭṭhāse kate.
anya-e1210n:362: Atikkante paṭhamakoṭṭhāse kiñci sādhikadasantarakappapamāṇe vicaṭṭaṭṭhāyikappassa paṭhamakoṭaṭhāse atikkante devadatto saṅghaṃ bhidi devadattapabbajjāpañho tatiyo
anya-e1210n:365: Āgantaṃ sādhanaṃ kammaṃ aniccaṃ niyamo bhave;
anya-e1210n:370: Evaṃ vutte yamakamme ca niyamakamme ca.
anya-e1210n:371: Yaṃ tathāgato…pe… evamadhippāyo athi yaṃ yena guṇena hetu bhutena…pe…evaṃ adhippayo hoti taṃ buddhānaṃ guṇaṃ abhutaṃ athiti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:372: Parakkamo dakkhāpito’ti pāramīpūraṇe parakkamo vāyāmo dakkhāpito pekkhāpito.
anya-e1210n:373: Hiyyo obhāsitā’ti jinānaṃ pāramī ca nayā bhiyyo atisayena obhāsitā.
anya-e1210n:374: Bhidi tithiyānaṃ vādagaṇṭhinti vaṃ tithiyānaṃ micchāvādagaṇṭhiṃ pabhidi.
anya-e1210n:376: Gambhīro uttānikato’ti ativiya gambhīro pañho tayā uttātīkato.
anya-e1210n:377: Sammāladdhaṃ jinaputtānaṃ nibbāhananti paramicchāvādaharaṇe upāyasaṅkhātaṃ nibbāhanamukhaṃ jinaputtānaṃ jinaputtehi suṭṭhu laddhaṃ.
anya-e1210n:378: Evametanti sabbaṃ heṭṭhāvuttavacanaṃ tayā vuttaṃ yathā hoti taṃ,
anya-e1210n:379: Sabbaṃ vacanaṃ evaṃ sabhāvato hotīti ajjhāhārayojanā;
anya-e1210n:381: Atiseṭṭha yathā tayā vuttaṃ mayaṃ tathā sampaṭicachāmā’ti;
anya-e1210n:383: Nathaññaṃ cethāti etesu saccesu vijjamānaṃ saccato aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭivedhassa ca nathi.
anya-e1210n:384: Sīharathenā’ti seṭṭharathena mañcarathena. Sīhasaddo vā usabhasaddo vā aññasaddena payutto seṭṭhavācako hotīti.
anya-e1210n:386: Kalalaṃ osaratīti idaṃ mātuyā piṭṭhikaṇṭakanābhīnaṃ majjhaṭṭhānabhute gabbhapatiṭṭhānārahaṭṭhāne sannicitaṃ paṭikalalasadisaṃ madarattalohitaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ, na kalalarūpaṃ.
anya-e1210n:387: Mukhapānenapi dvayasantipāto bhavatīti mukhapānenapi saha mātā ca utunī gabbho paccupaṭṭhito’ti dvayasannipāto bhavati.
anya-e1210n:388: Purimena tatha kāraṇaṃ vakkhāmīti purimena sāmavathunā tesaṃ dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sannipātānaṃ antogadhabhāve kāraṇaṃ yūttivacanaṃ kathessāmi.
anya-e1210n:389: Te sabbe’ti ye keci sattā mātugabbhaṃ okkantā te sabbe sattā ye vanarukkhādayo’ti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:390: Yo koci gadhabbo’ti yo kovi attano kammena tatha tatha upagannabbasatto.
anya-e1210n:393: Taṃ khayaṃ paridīpayanto’ti tena vacanena pubbapañcavassasatappa-māṇaṭṭhānāraha-saddhammakkhayaṃ paridīpayanto.
anya-e1210n:394: Sesakaṃ paricchidīti sesakaṃ pacchimapañcavassasataṃ saddhammatiṭṭhanakkhaṇaṃ paricchidi. Taṃ dīpanākāraṃ paricchadanākārañca dassento vassasataṃ sahassantiādimāha.
anya-e1210n:397_0: Tatra ye te satte kammaṃ vibādhati te ime sattā kāraṇaṃ paṭibāhanti, tesaṃ taṃ vacana
anya-e1210n:397_1: micchā’ti pothakesu likhitaṃ taṃ dujjānaṃ. Tasmā ye satte kammaṃ vibādhati, te sattā
anya-e1210n:397_2: kammavipākajā, dukkha vedanā vedayantīti ye pana sattā kāraṇaṃ paṭibāhanti tesaṃ
anya-e1210n:397_3: taṃ vacanaṃ micchā’ti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ. Evañhi sati pubbāparaṃ sameti.
anya-e1210n:398: Tatra ye te navavidhā’ti tatra dasavidhesu kuppavātesu ye te navavidhā kuppavātā.
anya-e1210n:399: Na te atīte uppajjantiti te vātā atīte bhave kammabalena na uppajjanti. Sesa padadvaye’pi eseva nayo.
anya-e1210n:400: Tehi tehi kopehī’ti tehi tehi sītādikopappakārehi.
anya-e1210n:401: Sakaṃ sakaṃ vedananti attano attano phalabhūtaṃ vedanaṃ.
anya-e1210n:402: Visamaparihārajā’ti catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ visadisaharaṇato jātā vedanā.
anya-e1210n:405: Bahutaraṃ avasesanti kammavipākajavedanāto avasesaṃ vedayitaṃ bahutaraṃ.
anya-e1210n:412: Ayaṃ gāthā vattabbā tatha dhanahetu’ti dāsidāsasaṅkhāta-jaṅgamadhana-hetu. Dhanañhi thāvarajaṅgama-saṃhārima-aṅgasama-anugāmidhanavasena pañcavidhaṃ.
anya-e1210n:414: Bhojanaṃ visamaṃ pariṇamatīti kucchigatabhojanaṃ visamaṃ paripakkabhāvaṃ gacchati.
anya-e1210n:415: Tāya ca pana vedanāyā’ti idaṃ kattathe karaṇavacanaṃ.
anya-e1210n:416: Nikāyavarañchake’ti etha lañchanti sañcānanti etena etha vā puññapāpāni paṇḍitajanāti lañchako’ti nikāyavaro ca so lañchako cāti viggaho.
anya-e1210n:418_0: Imasmiṃ pañhe therassa ekaṃsikaṃ byākaraṇaṃ na hoti. Tasmā vicārevā yaṃ yuttaraṃ
anya-e1210n:418_1: taṃ gahetabbaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ vicāraṇākāro. Maggavajjhā hi kilesā anupādinnakabhutā ye
anya-e1210n:418_2: neva atītā anāgatā na paccuppannā. Upādinnakanirodhakathā ca anāgatabhavaṃ sadhāya
anya-e1210n:418_3: kathitā bhagavato uppannā vedanā imasmiṃ paccuppannabhaveyeva hoti. Aparāparavedaniyakammañca
anya-e1210n:418_4: buddhapaccekabuddhehi’pi na sakkā nivāretuṃ. Tasmā therassa kammavipākato vā esā
anya-e1210n:418_5: vedanā nibbattā’ti vādo yuttataro’ti gahetabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā thero anekavihitaṃ
anya-e1210n:418_6: kathesī?Ti. Rājā milido ñāṇabhedaṃ gavesanto vicitrapaṭibhānaṃ sotukāmo hoti. Tassa
anya-e1210n:418_7: ajjhāsayavasena anekavihitaṃ kathesī’ti parihāro vattabbo aññesu īdisesu ṭhānesu
anya-e1210n:419: Katassa paticayo’ti catusu saccesu katasoḷasakiccassa paticayo puna vaḍḍhanaṃ nathi.
anya-e1210n:420_1: Athato pana paṭisallānaṭṭhāne lahitabbā samādhisatisampajaññādayo kusalā dhammā paṭisallānaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:424_1: kālaṃ pañcakkhadhasaṅkhātabhavassa pavattanaṃ na vaṇṇemi, appavattananibbānameva
anya-e1210n:427_0: Abhiññāyāhaṃ bhikkhave dhammaṃ desemīti pañcakkhadhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa
anya-e1210n:427_1: dhātuyo, cattāri saccāni, bāvīsatidriyāni, nava hetu, cattāro āhārā, sattavassā,
anya-e1210n:427_2: satta vedanā, satta saññā, satta cetanā, satta cittānītiādinā abhivisesena sabbaññutañāṇena
anya-e1210n:428_0: Aññaṃ uttariṃ…pe…satanti khuddānukhuddakato aññaṃ uttariṃ catupārājika - terasa saṅghādisesa
anya-e1210n:429: Tehipi na ekajjhakatā’ti attano cittaniṭṭhā ekantabhāvena na katā.
anya-e1210n:430: Dhammasaṇṭhitapariyāyenāti yañca taṃ āpattiṃ āpanno tañca yathādhammo kāretabbo’ti vuttadhammasaṇṭhitipariyāyena.
anya-e1210n:432_0: Aniccampana rūpanti vibhajjabyākaraṇiyo pañho’ti aniccaṃ nāmarūpaṃ, kiṃ. Rūpamevā?Ti
anya-e1210n:432_1: puṭṭho aniccaṃ nāmarūpampi aniccā vedanā pī’tiādinā nayena vibhajivā byākātabbo vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo
anya-e1210n:432_2: nāmā’ti atho. Kinnu kho cakkhunā sabbaṃ vijānātīti puggalo sabbaṃ cakkhunā kiṃ vijānātīti
anya-e1210n:432_3: imasmiṃ pañhe kenāpi puṭṭho’katamena cakkhunā samantacakkhunā udāhu maṃsacakkhunā’ti
anya-e1210n:432_4: vutte’āmā’ti vattabbo’ti ayaṃ pañho paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyo pañho nāmāti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:434: Samuhato bhayahetu arahato’ti bhayahetu arahato arahantena samūhato.
anya-e1210n:435: Unnatāvanatā’ti sukhe unnatiṭhānavasena unnatā dukkhe maṅkuvasena onatā
anya-e1210n:439: Tena tesaṃ pavattenā’ti tesaṃ parittānaṃ tejavantānaṃ tena pavattena.
anya-e1210n:441: Uddhamadho ācayamāno’ti sarīrassa uddhaṃ sukhaṃ vaḍḍhayamāno.
anya-e1210n:442: Corānaṃ ukkhittalaguḷantī pothakesu likhitaṃ vericorānaṃ ukkhattalaguḷampīti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ. Vericorehi ukkhittamuggaraṃ na sambhavatīti atho.
anya-e1210n:446: Sattānaṃ rakkhanaṃ mahārājā parittanti mahārāja, parittaṃ nāma sattānaṃ rakkhantānaṃ sattānaṃ anurakkhanaṃ hotīti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:447: Attanā katena ārakkhaṃ janātī’ti kammācaraṇādito pāpapuggalo attanā katena dosena parittassa rakkhanabhāvaṃ jahati vināseti.
anya-e1210n:449: Buddhabalato ca mārabalaṃ balavataraṃ na hotī’ti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:451: Tatra athantaraṃ athi’ti tatha tesu dvīsu vacanesu. Athabhedo athaviseso athi.’
anya-e1210n:452: Antaraṃ majjhavathañca khaṇokāso’pi hetusu vyavadhāne vinā cetha bhede chidde manasyapī’ti abhidhānasathe vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:453: Saññāvimokkhoti saññāya bhāvena āpattibhāvato vimokkho saññavimokkho. Sacittakāpattīti atho.
anya-e1210n:454: No saññāvimokkhoti saññāyābhāvena āpattibhāvato no vimokkho, nasaññāvimokkho, acittakāpattīti atho.
anya-e1210n:456: Etasmiñca mahārāja pañhe’ti etasmiṃ tayā pucchitapañhe.
anya-e1210n:457: Eko atho sāvaseso’ti’tathāgatassa kho ānadaevaṃ hotī’tiādivacanassa eko atho narāmisapariharaṇasaṅkhātaathena avasesena sāvaseso.
anya-e1210n:459: Katena ādānena vāti katena dosena vā.
anya-e1210n:466: Niccaṃ sarīre sādhyattā yamo nāmāti vuccare’ti;
anya-e1210n:472_0: Tatha ahiṃsā’ti iminā karuṇā vuttā. Saccanti vacīsaccañāṇasaccaparamathasaccāni.
anya-e1210n:472_1: Ādheyyanti ādheyyavacanatā brahmacārīti methunavirati. Apariggahoti mama idanti pariggahitataṇhārahitabhāvo
anya-e1210n:472_2: vutto santosamonasajjhāyā’ti dvādasavidhasantosā pāpappavāhā na buddhavacana sajjhāyā.
anya-e1210n:472_3: Kicchāparoti iminā dhūtaṅgapariharaṇaṃ bhāvanā’ti parikamma bhāvanādayo tisso bhāvanā.
anya-e1210n:472_4: Sayampākavane vāsā’ti etha imasmiṃ sayampākevane buddhasāsane sayampākavirati gahetabbā. Ādiākārenacāti.
anya-e1210n:474: Vihāro’ti samaṇasārupperiyāpathavihāro ceva dibbabrahmaariyavasena tividhadhammavihāro ca.
anya-e1210n:481: Bhaṇḍubhāvo dvaṅgulakesovā navamuṇḍo vā’ti adhippāyo bhavati hi.
anya-e1210n:482: “Yamo ca niyamo ceva cāro cavihāro tathā,
anya-e1210n:483: Saṃyamo saṃvaro ceva khantī ca soraccampi ca;
anya-e1210n:493: So sāmaññanti so samaṇabhāvo. Aggaparisanti bhikkhuparisasaṅkhātaṃ aggaparisaṃ.
anya-e1210n:494: So me āgamo’ti vīsatidhammadviliṅgānaṃ mayhaṃ sattāne so āgamo nathi.
anya-e1210n:496: Ye te bhabbā’ti ye te sattā bhavyā yuttā
anya-e1210n:499: Anusāsaniyaṃ anuvāsetīti uparibhāge passāvamagge vathikammaṃvuttaṃ āyubbede
anya-e1210n:501: Ñeyyaṃ pañcavidhaṃ kammaṃ vidhānaṃ tassa vuccate’ti;
anya-e1210n:503_0: Tatha nirūhavathikammaṃ adhobhāge vaccamagge kātabbaṃ. Anuvāsanavathikammaṃ uparibhāge
anya-e1210n:503_1: passāvamagge kātabbaṃ. Vathikammaṃ uttaravathikammampi idaṃ nāmadvayaṃ tesaṃyeva
anya-e1210n:511_0: Aññaṃ kayiramānaṃ aññena sambhavatīti aññaṃ lokuttaraphalaṃ ārabbha vipassanā kammaṃ
anya-e1210n:511_1: tena kayiramānaṃ aññena lokiyaphalena sambhavati, lokiyaphalaṃ detīti adhippāyo.
anya-e1210n:513: Kiriyāyeva katā’ti dosavantassa puggalassa kiriyāyayeva karaṇenayeva moghapurisavacanakatā’ti.
anya-e1210n:514: Savaṇena…pe… jigucchatīti bhagavato bhagavantassa savaṇena sāsanasavaṇena.
anya-e1210n:523: Iti phadana rukkhe’pi tāvade’ti milide āgataṃ. Jātake pana
anya-e1210n:525: Mayhampi vacanaṃ athi bhāradvāja suṇohi me”ti;
anya-e1210n:526: Āgataṃ idañca terasanipāte āgataṃ phadanajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:528_2: parinibbānasamattāya tesaṃ dvinnaṃ dāyakānaṃ anussaraṇe samattāyāti tīhi kāraṇehidve
anya-e1210n:530: Pūjetha naṃ pūjanīyassa dhātuṃ evaṃ kira bho saggamito gamissathāti idaṃanekavaṇṇavimāne vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:538_0: Sannativikopananti nāmarūpasantativināsanaṃ dhammo hi mahārājaahiṃsālakkhaṇo’ti sakalo
anya-e1210n:538_1: hi sabhāvavacanadhammo ahiṃsāvacanalakkhaṇo. Uddhataṃ mahārāja cittaṃ niggahetabbanti
anya-e1210n:538_4: Sati pana sabbatha līnuddhaccesuicchitabbā? “Satiṃ khavāhaṃ bhikkhavesabbathikaṃ vadāmī”ti vacanato.
anya-e1210n:539: Sayaṅkatenasoghātīyatīti so coro attanā katena duccaritakammenakattubhutena parighātīyati.
anya-e1210n:540_0: Api ca dhammānusathi anusāsīyatīti ekaṃsena bhagavato anusiṭṭhi paṇḍitajane aparādhikamanusse
anya-e1210n:540_1: anusāsayati dhammena anuvadāpeti.’ Niggahe niggahārahantivacanato vadato bhagavato
anya-e1210n:540_2: doso nathiti adhippāyo’niggahe niggahārahanti’ idañca dhammena nigahanaṃ sadhāya
anya-e1210n:540_3: vuttaṃ, na pīḷanakammaṃ sadhāya vuttanti idaṃ therena vattabbaṃ kasmā navuttanti
anya-e1210n:540_4: ce rañño ruciyā ananukūlattā. Thero hi yathā rājā kaṅkhaṃ vinayivā dhammasabhāvaṃ
anya-e1210n:540_5: jānāti tathā pañhaṃ byākarotīti. Bhagavatā saṅkhepavithāradesitanayena tathā tathā
anya-e1210n:540_6: hi pañhaṃ pakāseti. Esa yathā yathāssa saddhammatejavihatavilayanakhaṇena milidarājahadaye vimati payātīti.
anya-e1210n:547: Paṇāmīyatī’ti paṇametuṃ vā pabbājetuṃ vā arahati.
anya-e1210n:555: Aññaṃ ārādhetīti samattakārī paripuṇṇakārī aññaṃ arahattaphalaṃ ārādheti, attano santāne nipphādeti.
anya-e1210n:558: Ucchijjatī’ti yaṃ yena kāraṇena bhikkhubhāvo ucchijjati.
anya-e1210n:560: Manussantarenā’ti manussasānattena. Channañhi nānattaṃ ativiya nānattaṃ hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ vedasathe-
anya-e1210n:572: Yathādhammo kāretabbotiāpattidhammo vinaye tiṭṭhati. Yathā tiṭṭhati, tathā so bhikkhu saṅghena kāretabbo, tathā bodhetabbo.
anya-e1210n:574: Nete mahārāja guṇā puggalassāti puggalassa ete guṇā ekādasādisaṅkhā na honti. Mettā bhāvanāya eva ete guṇā. Mettāvihāri puggalassa saṃvijjantīti adhippāyo.
anya-e1210n:580: Mettābhāvanā hitānampi ahitānampīti hitarahitānampi sattesu pharaṇakamettābhāvanā sabbakusalaguṇāvahā sabbaniravajjaguṇānisaṃsā’va hoti.
anya-e1210n:581: Sabbesanti sabbesu viññāṇabaddhesu sattesu mahānisaṃsā mettābhāvanā samapharaṇavasena paṇḍitehi saṃvihajitabbā.
anya-e1210n:584_0: Yadā devadatto sigālo ahosi khattiyadhammo, so yāvatā jambudīpe padesarājāno te sabbe
anya-e1210n:584_1: anuyutte akāsi. Tadā bodhisatto vidhuro nāma paṇḍito ahosīti idaṃ dukanipāte sabbadāṭhajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:585: Yathā paṇihitanti yathā icchitaṃ, yathā ṭhapitaṃ vā.
anya-e1210n:588: Mittasama. No’ti attanā sahajāta-sahajanādhikehi mittehi samannāgato.
anya-e1210n:590: Saṅgāhako’ti catuhi dānādisaṅgahavathūhi catuhi janasaṅgāhakehi saṅgāhako.
anya-e1210n:592: Hitesī upanissitānanti sattāna nissāya vasantānaṃ puggalānaṃ dhanayasapaññāsaṅkhātahitagavesanasīlo.
anya-e1210n:601: Byattasaṅketā’ti pākaṭasaṅketā sulabhadassanaṃ dassanakāmānanti sīlavantānaṃ dassanakāmānaṃ upāsakopāsikānaṃ sulabhadassanaṃ sukhena labhitabbaṃ sīlavantadassanaṃ bhavissati.
anya-e1210n:613: Vājapeyyanti sappiādivathusaṅkhātaṃ vājaṃ pivanti ethāti vājapeyyo, taṃ rāgavasena visaññinā’ti rāgabalena pakatisñārahitena lomasakassapabodhisattena.
anya-e1210n:614: Ratto rāgavasenā’ti puttādisu ratto puttādīnaṃ maṅgalathāya rāgabalena pāṇaṃ hanti. Bhavatī ha-
anya-e1210n:615: “Ratto duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca mānī luddho tathā’laso,
anya-e1210n:616: Rājā ca ghātakā aṭṭha nāgasenena desitā;”
anya-e1210n:628: Samupādikā’ti sāmaṃ uddhaṃpathaviṃ pavattī’ti samupādikā. Udakassa upari samagamanaṃ nibbattīti atho.
anya-e1210n:635: Ārādhako hoti ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ kusalanti maggaphalanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ ñāyaṃ kusaladhammaṃ ārādhako samijjhanako hoti.
anya-e1210n:638: Idametha kāraṇanti manussānaṃ idaṃ niṭṭhāvacanaṃ etha ariyamaggaapāpuraṇapabbajane kāraṇaṃ hotīti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:639: Sayanti sāsanassa attanā jinasāsanavibbhantaṃ puggalaṃ kiṃ sodhessati?
anya-e1210n:650_0: Mahārajakkhā’ti paññāmaye akkhimhi mahantā rāgādirajā etesanti mahārajakkhā atha
anya-e1210n:650_1: vā akkhaṃ yesaṃ atthiti akkhā. Mahantaṃ rāgādirajaṃ etesanti mahārājā. Mahārajā ca
anya-e1210n:650_2: te akkhā cā ta mahārajakkhā. Mahārajā e mahārajakkhā’tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Imasmiṃ
anya-e1210n:655: Maggo pi tassamahiyā anaññāto’ti mahiyā maggo tassa addhikassa arahato anaññāto.
anya-e1210n:667_0: Punadeva latāya badhivā adāsī’ti idaṃjātake na pākaṭaṃ. Rañño paramparāgatavacanaṃ
anya-e1210n:667_1: gahevā vuttaṃ siyā. Api ca bodhisatto attano santikaṃ āgate badhanā amuñcivā ajjhupekkhito
anya-e1210n:667_2: punadeva latāya badhivā adāsi viya saññāya vuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e1210n:668: Rūḷarūḷassa pharusātipharusassa bhīmabhīmassa jūjakassa brāhmaṇassa savaṇe vattamāno.
anya-e1210n:669: Dārakedārakadvaye bodhisattassa adassanaṃ gamite sati so bodhisatto satadhā vā sahassadhā vā sokavasena.
anya-e1210n:670: Hadayaṃ na eli na phalesi idaṃ sattamaṃ dukkarato dukkarataraṃ ahosīti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:673: Lokiyaṃ bhante nāgasena lokuttarena viññāpitanti lokikaṃ athajātaṃ viya…pe…tayā lokuttarena athajātena viññāpitaṃ.
anya-e1210n:676: Dibbo atho’ti dibbasadiso ca ekantadibbo ca atho.
anya-e1210n:679: Yo kāyassa onāho’ti nāmakāyassa ca rūpakāyassa ca badhanākāro.
anya-e1210n:680: Patiyonāho’ti kammaṃ kātuṃ asamathatāvasena samantato badhanākāro.
anya-e1210n:681: Yo mahārāja kapiniddāpareto vokiṇṇatā jāgaratī’ti yā kapiniddāya piḷitassa puggalassa niddā vokiṇṇakaṃ jāgaraṃ gatiyā niddāmissakajāgarapavattanaṃ.
anya-e1210n:687: Sabhāvato nathi’ti kiñci opammanidassanamattaṃ sabhāvato sarūpato nathi. Guṇato pana anupalitto dviguṇato kiñci opammanidassanamattaṃ sakkā tuyhaṃ upadassayituṃ pakāsetuṃ.
anya-e1210n:688: Padumaṃ udakaṃ neva agadaṃ sāgaro tathā
anya-e1210n:692: Puna tīṇi puna tīṇi pañca guṇā paṇḍitehi vijāniyā
anya-e1210n:693: Tatha padumassa udake anupalittabhāvo eko guṇo nibbānaṃ anuppaviṭṭho.
anya-e1210n:695: Agadassa paṭisaraṇatā rogaantakaraṇatā amatatā’ti tayo guṇā.
anya-e1210n:696_1: guṇā bhojanassa āyudhāraṇatā balavaḍḍhanatā vaṇṇajananatā darathavūpasamanatā jigacchādubbalyapaṭivinodanatā’ti
anya-e1210n:696_2: pañcaguṇā. Ākāsassa ajāyanatā ajīraṇatā amīyanatā acavanatā anuppajjanatā duppasahatā
anya-e1210n:696_3: acoraharaṇatā anissitatā vihagagamanatā nirāvaraṇatā anantatā’ti dasa guṇā.
anya-e1210n:697: Maṇiratanassa kāmadadatā hāsakāraṇatā ujjotathakaraṇatā’ti tayo guṇā.
anya-e1210n:698: Lohitacadanassa dullabhatā asamagadhatā sujanappasathatāti tayo guṇā.
anya-e1210n:699: Sappimaṇḍassa vaṇṇasampannatā gadhasampannatā rasasampannatā’ti tayo guṇā.
anya-e1210n:700: Girisikharassa accuggatatā acalatā durabhirohatā bījārūhaṇatā anunayapaṭighavippamuttatā’tī pañcaguṇā nabbānaṃ anuppaviṭṭhā’ti.
anya-e1210n:702: Ethevākirā’ti etha eva tayā sikkhite nibbāne ākirāhī’ti abhikarohi vā ayameva vā pāṭho.
anya-e1210n:703: Anītito’ti anītibhāvato nibbānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesesu’pi eseva nayo.
anya-e1210n:710: Tato muccatha vimuttiyā’ti tato tena ārammaṇakiṇanena dasa saññābhāvanānuyogena vimuttiyā samucchedavimuttiyā vaṭṭadukkhato muccatha.
anya-e1210n:715: Upādāyupādāya vimuttānanti taṇhādiṭṭhisaṅkhātopaye upādāyupādāya vimuttānaṃ sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmīnaṃ
anya-e1210n:717_0: Tathā buddhaṃ sokanudaṃ…pe… umma disvā sadevake’ti etha tathā eva ummiṃ disvā mahantaṃ
anya-e1210n:717_1: dhammौmmiṃ ñāṇacakkhunā disvā buddhaṃ sokanudaṃ anumānena anumānañāṇena kātabbaṃ
anya-e1210n:717_2: ñātabbaṃ. Sadevakeloke yathā dhammo ummivipphāro tathā sadevake lokebuddho aggo bhavissatī’ti
anya-e1210n:721: Anumānena ñātabbaṃ buddho ca mahanto buddhasīhanādo ca mahanto’ti viññātabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:722_0: Laggaṃ disvā bhusaṃ paṅkaṃ kalaladdaṃ gataṃ mahinti laggaṃ laggāpanasamathaṃ mahantaṃ
anya-e1210n:722_1: paṅkañca disvā kalaladāyakaṃ udakañca gataṃ mahiṃ mahiyā gataṃ paviṭṭhaṃ disvā paṇḍitā
anya-e1210n:726: Vissaṭṭhaṃ dhammasāgare’ti nibbānasaṅkhāte mahāsamudde dhammanaddhiyā vissaṭṭhaṃ vissajjitaṃ pavesitaṃ.
anya-e1210n:727: Dhammāmatagataṃ dhammāmate pavattaṃ sadevakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ iṃ mahiṃ mahiyā ṭhitaṃ imaṃ sādhujanasamūhaṃ.
anya-e1210n:729: Dhammakkhadho mahā’gato’ti sammāsambuddhacaraṇasaṅkhāto caturāsītiyā dhammakkhadhasahassānaṃ desitattā mahādhammakkhadhoāgato pavatto’ti anumānañāṇena ñātabbanti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:731: Katamena te pariyāyena anuyogaṃ te dammi’ti anuyogaṃ vaṃ pucchi ahaṃ byākarissāmi. Anuyogavacanaṃ te tava katamena kāraṇena dammi.
anya-e1210n:732: Vamevetaṃ brūhīti rājavacanaṃ bhante nāgasena vameva pariyāyaṃ brūhi.
anya-e1210n:733: Tenahī’ti tasmā tava sotukāmatāya satena vā…pe…koṭisatasahassena vā pariyāyaṃ te kathayissāmīti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:738: Mayhaṃ puṭṭho’ti imasmiṃ dhūtaṅgavaraguṇe paribyattatāya chekatāya pākaṭāya buddhiyā yuttakāraṇaparidīpanaṃ samosarissatīti.
anya-e1210n:745_0: Milidapañhameṇḍakapañhesu sabbe pañhā sampiṇḍitā pañcasattādhikasatapañhā honti.
anya-e1210n:745_2: Sesā’ rañño cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī’tiādikā ekūnacattāḷīsa mātikā niddesavasena
anya-e1210n:745_3: avissajjitā yatha pothakesu dissanti tato gahetabbā yevā’ti.
anya-e1210n:746_0: Catasso dhammadesanāyo; dhammādhiṭṭhānā dhammadesanā, dhammādhiṭṭhānā puggaladesanā,
anya-e1210n:746_1: puggalādhiṭṭhānā dhammadesanā, puggalādhiṭṭhānā puggaladesanā’ti. Tāsu purimā tisso
anya-e1210n:746_2: dhammadesanā idha gathe labbhanti, catutho na labbhati.
anya-e1210n:750: (Athasadassanā) paccayākārapaccayathaparamathaṃ desentī pavattā dhammadesanā athasadassanā nāma.
anya-e1210n:752: (Niggahadesanā) sakalavinayapiṭakaṃ ādiṃ kavā yā kāci kilesapāpapuggalaniggahadesanā esā niggahadesanā nāma.
anya-e1210n:753: (Sampahaṃsanā) bhayabhīrukānaṃ puggalānaṃ bhayapaṭisedhanathāya upathambhajanana-maggānisaṃsa-sīlathomanādikā desanā sampahaṃ-sanā nāma.
anya-e1210n:754: (Cariyāvodānanidassanā) sakalajātakaṃ acchiyasuttaṃ ādiṃ kavā dvedhāvitakkabodhirājakumārasuttādisambadhādesanā cariyāvodānanidassanā nāma.
anya-e1210n:755: (Pucchāvissajjanā) aṭṭhahi parisāhi pucchitānaṃ pañhānaṃ vissajjanāpaṭisaṃyuttā sakalasagāthavaggamādiṃ kavā vammikasutta-parāyaṇasuttādikā desanā pucchāvissajjanā nāma.
anya-e1210n:759: (Pavenisadassanakathā). Buddhavaṃsa-mahāpadānasuttākārā attano ca paresañca abhinīhāramārabbha parinibbānapariyosānā pavenisadassanakathā nāma.
anya-e1210n:763_1: dhammā vibhattā taṃ tatha sabhāgavisabhāgaparidīpikā abhidhammadesanā ca lakkhaṇaparidīpikā
anya-e1210n:763_2: ye caññe dhammā salakkhaṇadhāraṇakā attano sabhāvavasena vuttā esā dhammasabhāvaguṇanidassanā nāma.
anya-e1210n:764: Imehi cuddasavidhehi lokagganāyakā dhammaṃ desenti tesañca sāvakā’ti.
anya-e1210n:765: Tesu pacchāvisajjanā desanā idha pākaṭā. Sesā yathārahaṃ idha gahetabbā yevāti.
anya-e1210n:766_1: anāpatattikathā ca. Tatha yaṃ therena bhagavato vacanaṃ rañño saññāpanathaṃ ābhataṃ
anya-e1210n:767: (Anāpattikathā). Yā therena sakapaṭibhānena vuttā sā anāpattikathā nāma.
anya-e1210n:769_0: Meṇḍakamilidapañhesu therassa sakapaṭibhānena anāpatti. Yampanarañño sañañāpanathaṃ
anya-e1210n:769_1: āharavā vuttaṃ tatha āpattī’ti (dve kathā) puna dve kathā idha honti sammutikathā
anya-e1210n:770: (Sammutikathā). Tatha sammutikathā nāma’bhante nāgasena vedagu upalabbhatī’tiādikā.
anya-e1210n:771: Paramathakathā nāma’yo uppajjati so eva so’tiādikātenāha?
anya-e1210n:772: Duve saccāni akkhāsi sambuddho vadataṃ varo,
anya-e1210n:774_0: Yampubbe vuttaṃ anumānakathā upamākathā’ti, tāsu upamākathāya visuṃ koṭṭhāsabhāvo
anya-e1210n:774_1: nathi. Milidapañhameṇḍakapañhānaṃ antarantarā ṭhitā hoti. Anumānakathā pana visuṃ
anya-e1210n:781: Jātakuddharaṇaṃ pana evaṃ veditabbaṃ. Meṇḍakapañhatatiyavagge pañca pañca pañhā.
anya-e1210n:782: “Acetanaṃ brāhmaṇa asuṇantaṃ…pe… pucchasi taṃ kissa hetu“ti idaṃcatukkanipāte āgataṃpalāsajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ. Katamaṃ taṃ jātakanti?’
anya-e1210n:783: Acetanaṃ brāhmaṇā’ti idaṃ sathā parinibbānamañce nipanno ānadatheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
anya-e1210n:786: “Iti phadanarukkhā’pi tā devatā…pe… bhāradvāja suṇohi me”ti āgataṃ. Idañca terasanipātephadanajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ. Katamaṃ taṃ jātakanti?
anya-e1210n:787: “Kuṭhārihatho puriso’ti idaṃ sathā rohiṇīnadītīre viharanto ñātakānaṃ kalahaṃ ārabbha kathesi vanasaṇḍe devatā aha”nti.
anya-e1210n:790_0: “Bhante nāgasena, tumhe bhaṇatha? Devadattoekantakaṇho ekantakaṇhehi dhammehi samannagato,
anya-e1210n:790_1: bodhisatto ekantasukkehi dhammehi samannagato’ti. Puna ca devadatto bhave bhave yasena
anya-e1210n:790_2: ca pakkhena ca bodhisattena samasamo hoti kadāci adhikataro vā yadā devadatto nagare
anya-e1210n:790_3: bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadattassa rañño purohitaputto ahosi, tadā bodhisatto chavakacaṇḍālo
anya-e1210n:790_4: vijjādharo, vijjaṃ parijapivā akāle ambaphalāni nibbattesi. Etha tāva bodhisatto
anya-e1210n:790_5: devadattena jātiyā nihīno yasasā ca nihīno …pe… puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto tāpo
anya-e1210n:790_6: nāma rājā ahosi tadābodhisatto tassa putto dhammapālo nāma ahosi tadā so rājā sakaputtassa
anya-e1210n:790_7: hathapāde sīsañca chidāpesi. Tatha tāva devadattoyeva uttaro adhikataro. Ajjetarahi
anya-e1210n:790_8: ubho’pi sakyakule jāyisu. Bodhisatto buddho ahosi sabbaññu lokanāyako. Devadatto
anya-e1210n:790_9: atidevassa sāsane pabbajivā iddhiṃ nibbattevā buddhālayaṃ akāsi. Kinnu kho bhante
anya-e1210n:790_10: nāgasena yaṃ mayā bhaṇitaṃ taṃ sabbaṃ tathaṃ udāhu vitathanti? “Ayampana milidaraññā
anya-e1210n:790_11: yāni bāvīsatijātakāni nissāya pucchito hoti tāni mayā uddharivā idha kathetabbāni.
anya-e1210n:791_0: Tatha ca,’yadā ca devadatto nagare bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadattassa rañño purohitaputto
anya-e1210n:791_1: ahosi tadā bodhisatto chavakacaṇḍālo ahosi vijjādharo vijjaṃ parijapivā akāle ambaphalāni
anya-e1210n:791_2: nibbattesi. Etha tāva bodhisatto devadattato jātiyā nihīno yasasā ca nihīno. “Idampana
anya-e1210n:791_3: vacanaṃ jetavanārāme viharantena sathārā terasanipāte devadattamārabbha kathitaṃ
anya-e1210n:791_4: ambajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti. Devadatto hi “ahaṃ buddho bhavissāmi…pe… caṇḍālaputto ahamevā”ti.
anya-e1210n:792: Evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ ambajātakaṃ sadhāya kathitaṃ hotīti idaṃ rañño ābhataṃ paṭhamaṃ jātakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:793_0: “Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto rājā ahosi mahīpati sabbakāmasamaṅgī tadā bodhisatto
anya-e1210n:793_1: tassūpabhogo ahosi hathināgo sabbalakkhaṇasampanno tassa cārugativilāsaṃ asahamāno
anya-e1210n:793_2: rājā vadhaṃ icchanto hathācariyaṃ evamavova? “Asikkhito te ācariya hathināgo tassa
anya-e1210n:793_3: ākāsagamanaṃ nāma kāraṇaṃ hotī”ti tathapa tāca bodhisatto devadattato jātiyā nīhīno,
anya-e1210n:793_4: lāmako tiracchānagato”ti. Idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā veḷuvane viharantena sathārā
anya-e1210n:793_5: ekakanipāte devadattamārabbhakathitaṃ dummedhajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti dhammasabhāyaṃ
anya-e1210n:793_6: bhikkhu’āvuso devadatto …pe… hathi pana ahamevā”ti evametaṃ milidarañño imaṃ dummedhajātakaṃ
anya-e1210n:794_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto manusso ahosi. Pavane naṭṭhāyiko tadā bodhisatto mahāpathavi
anya-e1210n:794_1: nāma makkaṭo ahosi. Ethapi tāva dissati viseso manussassa ca tiracchānagatassa ca.
anya-e1210n:794_2: Ethapi tāva bodhisatto devadattato jātiyā nihīno’ti imaṃ pana vacanaṃ milidaraññā
anya-e1210n:794_3: veḷuvane viharantena sathārā tiṃsanipāte devadattassa silāpavijjhanamārabbha kathitaṃ
anya-e1210n:794_4: mahākapijātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti? “Tena hi dhanuggahe payojevā…pe… kapirājā ahamevā”ti
anya-e1210n:794_5: evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃmahākapijātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hotīti. Tatiyaṃ jātakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:795_0: “Pūna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto manusso hoti soṇuttaro nāma nesādo balavā balavataro
anya-e1210n:795_1: nāgabalo tadābodhisatto chaddanto nāma nāgarājā ahosi. Tadā luddako taṃ hathināgaṃ
anya-e1210n:795_2: ghātesi. Tathapi tāva devadatto adhikataro“ti idaṃ vacanaṃ milidaraññā jetavane mahāvihāre
anya-e1210n:795_3: vihārantena sathārā tiṃsanipāte ekaṃ daharabhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kathitaṃ chaddantajātakaṃ
anya-e1210n:795_4: sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti tatha bhagavatā vithārato desitaṃ chaddantajātakaṃ taṃ mayā idha
anya-e1210n:795_5: saṅkhepato uddharivā kathetabbameva. “Sā kira sāvathiyaṃ…pe… sā pana bhikkhuṇī pacchā
anya-e1210n:795_6: vipassivā arahattaṃ pattā”ti. Evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ chaddantajātakaṃ sadhāya
anya-e1210n:796_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto manusso ahosi vanacarako aniketavāsī tadā bodhisatto
anya-e1210n:796_1: sakuṇo ahosi tittiro mantajjhāyī. Tadā so vanacarako taṃ sakuṇaṃ ghātesi. Tathapi
anya-e1210n:796_2: tāva devadatto jātiyā adhikataro”ti idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā gijjhakūṭe viharantena
anya-e1210n:796_3: sathārā navakanipāte devadattassa vadhāya parisakkanaṃ ārabbha kathitaṃ daddarajātakaṃ
anya-e1210n:796_4: (tittirajātakaṃ) sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti. “Tasmiṃ samaye dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ…pe…
anya-e1210n:796_5: tittirapaṇḍito pana ahamevā”ti. Evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ daddarajātakaṃ sadhāya
anya-e1210n:797_0: “Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto kalābu nāma bārāṇasirājā ahosi tadā bodhisatto tāpaso
anya-e1210n:797_1: ahosi khantivādī. Tadā so rājā tassatāpasassa kuddho hathapāde vaṃsakalīre viya chedāpesi.
anya-e1210n:797_2: Tathapi tāva devadattoyeva adhikataro jātiyā ca yasena cā”ti idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā
anya-e1210n:797_3: jecavane viharantena sathārā catukkanipāte ekaṃ kodhanabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathitaṃ
anya-e1210n:797_4: khantivādijātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti. “Sathā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ kasmāvaṃ…pe… khantivāditāpasopana
anya-e1210n:797_5: ahamevā”ti evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ khantivādijātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hotīti. Paṭṭhajātakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:798_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto ahosi vanacaro tadābodhisatto nadiyo nāma vānarido ahosi.
anya-e1210n:798_1: Tadāpi so vanacaro taṃ vānaridaṃ ghātesi saddhiṃ mātarā katiṭṭhabhātikenapi. Tathapi
anya-e1210n:798_2: tāva devadattoyevaadhikataro jātiyā“ti idaṃ pana vacanaṃ milidaraññā veḷuvane viharantenasathārā
anya-e1210n:798_3: dukanipāte devadattaṃ ārabbha kathitaṃ cullanadiyajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti. “Ekadivasañhi
anya-e1210n:798_4: bhikkhū dhammasahāyaṃ …pe… supaṇṇarājā pana ahamevā”ti evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ
anya-e1210n:798_5: paṇḍarajātakaṃ sadhāya paratoghosavasena bodhisatto paṇḍarako nāma nāgarāja ahosī”ti
anya-e1210n:798_6: kathitaṃ hoti tathāhi imasmiṃ jātake bodhisatto supaṇṇarājā yevā’ti. Aṭṭhamaṃ jātakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:799_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto manusso ahosipavane jaṭilako tadā bodhisatto tacchako
anya-e1210n:799_1: nāma mahāsūkaro ahosi. Tathapi tāva devadattoyeva jātiyā adhikataro”ti idampana vacanaṃ
anya-e1210n:799_2: milidaraññā jetavane viharantena sathārā pakiṇṇakanipāte dve mahallake there ārabbha
anya-e1210n:799_3: kathitaṃ tacchakasūkarajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti. “Mahākosalo pana bimbisārassa
anya-e1210n:800_0: Evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ tacchakasūkarajātakaṃ sadhāya paratoghosavasena bodhisatto
anya-e1210n:800_1: mahātacchakasūkaro nāma ahositi kathitaṃ tathā hi imasmiṃ jātake bodhisatto rukkhadevatāyeva
anya-e1210n:801_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadādevadatto cetiyesu suraparicaro nāma rājā ahosi upari purisamatte
anya-e1210n:801_1: gaganevehāsaṅgamo, tadā bodhisatto kapilo nāma brāhmaṇo ahosi. Tathapi tāva devadattassa
anya-e1210n:801_2: pathavippavesamārabbha kathitaṃ cetiyajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti. “Tasmiñhi divase
anya-e1210n:801_3: bhikkhū dhammasahāyaṃ. Pe-kapila-brāhmaṇo pana ahamevā”ti evañcetaṃ milidaraññā idaṃcetiyajātakaṃ
anya-e1210n:802_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto manusso ahosi sāmo nāma, tadā bodhisatto rūrunāma migarājā
anya-e1210n:802_1: ahosi. Tathapi tāva devadattoyeva jātiyā adhikataro’ti idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā
anya-e1210n:802_2: jetavane viharantena sathārā terasakanipāte devadattamārabbhakathitaṃ rūrūmagarājajātakaṃ
anya-e1210n:802_3: sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti. So kira bhikkhūhi’bahupakāro āvuso-perūrumigo pana ahamevā”ti.
anya-e1210n:802_4: Evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃrūrumigajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hotī’ti ekādasamaṃ jātakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:803_0: “Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto manusso ahosi luddako pavanacaro, tadā bodhisatto hathināgo
anya-e1210n:803_1: ahosi so luddako tassa hathināgassa sattakkhattuṃ dante chidivā hari tathapi tāva
anya-e1210n:803_2: devadattoyeva yoniyā adhikataro’ti idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā jetavane viharantena
anya-e1210n:803_3: sathārā ekakanipāte devadattamārabbha kathitaṃ sīlavanāgarājajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ
anya-e1210n:803_4: hoti. Dhammasabhāyañhi bhikkhū’āvuso devadatto…pe… sīlavanāgarājā pana ahamevāti.
anya-e1210n:804: Evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ sīlavanāgarājajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hotī’ti dvādasamaṃ jātakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:805_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto sigālo ahosi khattiyadhammo, so yāvatā jambudīpe padesarājāno
anya-e1210n:805_1: te sabbe anuyutte akāsi, tadā bodhisatto vidhuro nāma paṇḍito ahosi tathapi tāva
anya-e1210n:805_2: devadattoyeva yasena adhikataro’ti idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā veḷuvane viharantena
anya-e1210n:805_3: sathārā dukanipāte devadattamārabbha kathitaṃ sabbadāṭhajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1210n:806_0: Evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ sabbadāṭhika jātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ paratoghosavasena “so
anya-e1210n:806_1: yāvatā jambudīpe padesarājāno, te sabbe anuyutte akāsī”ti vuttaṃ tadā hi sona sabbe
anya-e1210n:807_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto sathināgo huvā laṭukikāya sakuṇikāya puttakeghātesi,
anya-e1210n:807_1: tadā bodhisatto’pi hathināgo ahosi yuthapati tatha tāva ubho’pi samasamā ahesunti’
anya-e1210n:807_2: idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā veḷuvane viharantena sathārā pañcakanipāte devadattamārarabbha
anya-e1210n:807_3: kathitaṃ laṭukikajātakaṃ sadhāyavuttaṃ hotī’ti cuddasamaṃ jātakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:808_0: Puna ca paraṃ “yadā devadatto yakkho ahosi adhammo nāma, tadā bodhisattopi yakkho
anya-e1210n:808_1: ahosi dhammo nāma. Tathapi tāva ubhopi samasamā ahesunti“idaṃ pana vacanaṃ milidaraññā
anya-e1210n:808_2: jetavane viharantena sathārā ekādasakanipāte devadattassa pathavippavesamārabbha
anya-e1210n:808_3: kathitaṃ dhammadevaputta jātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti. “Tadā bhikkhu dhammisabhāyaṃ
anya-e1210n:808_4: dhammadevaputto pana ahameva sammāsambuddho”ti. Evametaṃ milidarañño imaṃ dhammadevaputtajātakaṃ
anya-e1210n:809_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto nāviko ahosi, pañcannaṃ kulasatānaṃ issaro, tadā bodhisattopi
anya-e1210n:809_1: nāviko ahosi pañcannaṃ kulasatānaṃ issaro tathapi tāva ubhopi samasamā’ca ahesunti“idampana
anya-e1210n:809_2: milidaraññā jetavane viharantena sathārā dvādasakanipāte devadattassa pañcakulasatāni
anya-e1210n:809_3: gahevā niraye paviṭṭhabhāvamārabbha kathitaṃ samuddavāṇijajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ
anya-e1210n:809_4: hoti. “So hi aggasāvakesu parisaṃ gahevā sopaṇḍitavaḍaḍhakī nāma ahamevā”ti. Evametaṃ
anya-e1210n:809_5: milidararañañā imaṃ samuddavāṇijajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hotī’ti. Soḷasamaṃ jātakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:810_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto sathavāho ahosi pañcannaṃ sakaṭasatānaṃ issaro, tadā
anya-e1210n:810_1: bodhisattopi sathavāho ahosi pañcannaṃ sakaṭasatānaṃ issaro. Tathapi tāva ubhopi
anya-e1210n:810_2: samasamā ahesu”nti idampanavacanaṃ milidaraññā jetavane viharantena sathārā ekakanipāte
anya-e1210n:810_3: anāthapiṇḍikassasahāyake tithayasāvake ārabbha kathitaṃ apaṇṇaka jātakaṃ sadhāya
anya-e1210n:811_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto sākho nāma migarājā ahosi, tadā bodhisattopi nigrodho
anya-e1210n:811_1: nāma migarājā ahosi. Tathapi tāva ubhopi samasamā ahesunti “idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā
anya-e1210n:811_2: jetavane viharantena sathārā ekakanipāte kumārakassapamātaraṃ bhikkhuṇiṃ ārabbha
anya-e1210n:811_3: kathitaṃ nigrodhamigajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti sā kira rājagahanagare mahāvibhavassa
anya-e1210n:811_4: seṭṭhino dhītā ahosi nigrodhamigarājā pana ahamevā”ti eva metaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ
anya-e1210n:811_5: nigrodhamigarājajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hotī’ti. Aṭṭhārasamaṃ jātakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:812_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto sākho nāma senāpati ahosi, tadā bodhisatto nigrodho
anya-e1210n:812_1: nāma rājā ahosi. Tathapi tāva ubhopi samasamā ahesunti idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā
anya-e1210n:812_2: veḷuvane viharantena sathārā dasakanipāte devadattāmārabbha kathitaṃ nigrodhajātakaṃ
anya-e1210n:812_3: sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti. “Ekadivasañhi bhikkhū nigrodhajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hotī’ti.
anya-e1210n:813_0: Puna ca paraṃ sadā devadatto khaṇḍahālo nāma brāhmaṇo ahosi, tadā bodhisatto cado
anya-e1210n:813_1: nāma rājakumāro ahosi. Tathāpi tāva anena khaṇḍahālo adhikataro’ti “idampana vacanaṃ
anya-e1210n:813_2: milidaraññā gijjhakūṭe viharantena sathārā dasajātakedevadattamārabbha kathitaṃ cadakumārajātakaṃ
anya-e1210n:813_3: sadhāya vuttaṃ taṃ saṅkhepano dassayissāma. “Tassa vathu saṅghabhedakkhadhake āgatameva
anya-e1210n:813_4: cadakumāro pana ahamovā”ti evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ vadakumārajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttanti vīsatimajātakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:814_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto brahmadatto nāma rāja ahosi, tadā bodhisatto tassa putto
anya-e1210n:814_1: mahāpadumo nāma kumāro ahosi, tadā sorājā sakaputtaṃ corappapāte khipāpesi. Yato
anya-e1210n:814_2: kutoci pitā puttānaṃ adhikataro ahosi visiṭṭho, tathapi tāva devadattoyeva adhikataro’ti
anya-e1210n:814_3: idampana evanaṃ milidaraññā jetavane viharantena sathārā dvādasakanipāte ciñcaṃ māṇavikamārabbha
anya-e1210n:814_4: kathitaṃ mahāpadumajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ. “Paṭhamabodhiyañhi dasabalassa ahaṃ tadā
anya-e1210n:814_5: rājaputto, evaṃ dhāretha jātakanti, evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ mahāpadumajātakaṃ sadhāya
anya-e1210n:815_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto mahāpatāpo nāma rājā ahosi, tadā bodhisatto tassa putto
anya-e1210n:815_1: dhammapālo nāma kumāro ahosi, tadā so rājā sakaputtassa hathapāde sīsañca chedāpesi.
anya-e1210n:815_2: Tathapi tāva devadatto yeca uttaro adhikataro”ti idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā veḷuvane
anya-e1210n:815_3: viharantena sathārā pañcakanipāte devadattassavadhaparisakkanamārabbha kathitaṃ culladhammapālajātakaṃ
anya-e1210n:815_4: sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti. “Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhu dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ dhammapālakumāro
anya-e1210n:815_5: pana ahamevā”ti evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ culladhammapālajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttanti
anya-e1210n:825_0: Evañca so rājā imāni jātakāni sadhāya kathevā punapi evamāha? “Bhante nāgasena, ajjekarahi
anya-e1210n:825_1: ubhopi sakyakulesu jāyiṃsu. Bodhisattopi buddho ahosi. Sabbaññu lokanāyako, devadatto
anya-e1210n:825_2: tassa devātidevassa sāsane pabbajivā buddhālayaṃ akāsi. Kinnukho bhante nāgasena,
anya-e1210n:825_3: yaṃ mayā bhaṇitaṃ taṃ sabbampi tathaṃ udāhu vitathanti.”
anya-e1210n:831: Āsajja rājā citrakathī ukkādhāraṃ tamonudaṃ apucchi nipuṇe pañhe ṭhānāṭhānagate puthū,
anya-e1210n:840: Sāmayiko ca kusalo paṭibhāne ca kovido;
anya-e1210n:848: Katheti so manussehi pabbate kesarī yathā’ti;
anya-e1210n:849: Caraṇena ceva sampannaṃ sudantaṃ uttame dame,
anya-e1210n:851: Kathikā mayā bahū diṭṭhā sākacchā osaṭā bahū,
anya-e1210n:852: Na tādisaṃ bhayaṃ āsi ajjatāso yathā mama;
anya-e1210n:854: Jayo’va nāgasenassa yathā cittaṃ na saṇṭhitanti;
anya-e1210n:856: Yathā hi aṅgasambhārā hoti saddo ratho iti,
anya-e1210n:857: Evaṃ khadhesu santesu hoti sattoti sammuti;
anya-e1210n:858: Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañeñā cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ,
anya-e1210n:859: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭanti;
anya-e1210n:860: Ayampatiṭṭhā dharaṇīva pāṇinaṃ idañca mūlaṃ kusalābhivuddhiyā,
anya-e1210n:868: Paṭigacceva taṃ kayirā yaṃ jaññā hitamattano,
anya-e1210n:870: Yathā sākaṭiko nāma samaṃ hivā mahāpathaṃ,
anya-e1210n:890: Patho ca saṅkamo tithaṃ aṭṭhete parivajjiyā;
anya-e1210n:891: Ratto duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca mānī luddho tathā’laso,
anya-e1210n:892: Ekacintī ca bālo ca ete athavināsakā;
anya-e1210n:893: Ratto duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca bhīru āmisacakkhuko,
anya-e1210n:894: Ithi soṇḍo paṇḍako ca navamo bhavati dārako;
anya-e1210n:895: Navete puggalā loke ittarā calitā calā,
anya-e1210n:896: Etehi mantitaṃ guyhaṃ khippaṃ bhavati pākaṭaṃ;
anya-e1210n:900: Yesaṃ etāni samhonti tesaṃ buddhi pabhijjati;
anya-e1210n:902: Na sādiyanti sakkāraṃ buddhānaṃ esa dhammatā’ti
anya-e1210n:921: Mayhampi vacanaṃ athi bhājadvāja suṇohi me’ti; (Jātakagāthā)
anya-e1210n:922: Cudassa bhattaṃ bhuñjivā kammārassā’ti me sutaṃ,
anya-e1210n:924: Sathavāto bhayaṃ jātaṃ niketā jāyatī rajo,
anya-e1210n:925: Aniketamasathavaṃ etaṃ ve munidassananti; (Jinabhāsitā minidena vuttā)
anya-e1210n:927: Na icche saha nidāya evaṃ sayha vijānahīti; (Jātakagāthā lomakassapena vuttā)
anya-e1210n:936: Na me ācariyo atha sadiso me na vijjati,
anya-e1210n:937: Sadevakasmiṃ lokasmiṃ nathi me paṭipuggalo’ti; (Khadhakagāthā jinabhāsitā)
anya-e1210n:944: Ussahate tārayituṃ mārabalanisūdane buddhe’ti; (Ayaṃ gāthā sāriputtatherenābhatā)
anya-e1210n:946: Dhunātha maccuno senaṃ naḷāgāraṃ’va kuñjaro’ti; (Jinabhāsitā milidena vuttā)
anya-e1210n:947: Yo sīla vā dussīlesu dadāti dānaṃ
anya-e1210n:950: Taṃ ve dānaṃ dāyakato visujjhatī’ti; (Ayaṃ nāgasenena ābhatā)
anya-e1210n:951: Na me dessā ubho puttā maddī devī na appiyā,
anya-e1210n:952: Sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ tasmā piye adāsahanti;
anya-e1210n:953: Sahassagghañhi maṃ tāto brāhmaṇassa pitā adā,
anya-e1210n:954: Atho kaṇhājinaṃ kaññaṃ hathinañca satena cā’ti;
anya-e1210n:955: Jigacchāya pipāsāya ahinā daṭṭho visena ca,
anya-e1210n:956: Aggi udaka sattīhi akāle tatha miyyati;
anya-e1210n:962: Na pupphagadho paṭivātameti na cadanaṃ tagaramallikā vā,
anya-e1210n:963: Satañca gadho paṭivātameti sabbā disāsappuriso pavāti;
anya-e1210n:964: Cadanaṃ tagaraṃ vāpi uppalaṃ atha vassikī,
anya-e1210n:967: Yo ca sīlavataṃ gadho vāta devesu uttamo’ti;
anya-e1210n:968: Kammamūlaṃ janā davā gaṇhanti amataṃ phalaṃ,
anya-e1210n:969: Tena te sukhitā honti ye kītā amataṃ phalanti;
anya-e1210n:970: Ye keci loke agadā visānaṃ paṭibāhakā,
anya-e1210n:972: Ye keci osadhā loke vijjanti vividhā bahū,
anya-e1210n:973: Dhammosadha samaṃ nathi etaṃ pivatha bhikkhavo’ti;
anya-e1210n:979: Kammena taṃ kiṇivāna ratanaṃ vo piladhathā’ti;
anya-e1210n:981: Na ca vikkhippate cittaṃ etaṃ tumhe piladhathā’ti;
anya-e1210n:983: Khippaṃ phasseti amataṃ na ca so rocate bhave’ti;
anya-e1210n:991: Kammena taṃ kiṇivāna ratanaṃ vo piladhathā’ti;
anya-e1210n:1004: Ratā ekāsane viññu dhammanagare vasanti te;
anya-e1210n:1011: Sotāpannā ca vimalā sakadāgāmino ca ye,
anya-e1210n:1012: Anāgāmī ca arahanto dhammanagare vasanti te;
anya-e1210n:1020: Sudantā uttame dame dhammanagare vasanti te;
anya-e1210n:1021: Tevijjā jaḷabhiññā ca iddhiyā pāramiṃ gatā,
anya-e1210n:1026: Anumānena jānanti athi so bhagavā iti;
anya-e1210n:1028: Yathā’yaṃ dissate ūmī mahanto so bhavissati;
anya-e1210n:1034: Yathā accuggato esa himavā so bhavissati;
anya-e1210n:1038: Tathā hi so mahāvīro aggo buddho bhavissati;
anya-e1210n:1051: Laggaṃ disvā bhisaṃ paṅkaṃ kalaladdagataṃ mahiṃ,
anya-e1210n:1058: Yathā’yaṃ vāyatī gadho hessanti pupphitā dumā;
anya-e1210n:1063: Puna passati gihi rājā anāgāmiphale ṭhite;
anya-e1210n:1064: Ubho’pi te vilokevā uppajji saṃsayo mahā,
anya-e1210n:1065: Bujjheyya ce gihidhamme dhutaṅgaṃ nipphalaṃ siyā;
anya-e1210n:1067: Hada pucche kathiseṭṭhaṃ so me kaṅkhaṃ vinossatī’ti
anya-e1210n:1069: Milidappakaraṇe sabbā gāthā sampiṇḍitā caturādhikasatagāthā honti.
anya-e1210n:1072_2: -chasaṭṭhi-diyaḍḍhasatanti pañcavīsatividhā saṅkhyā. Tatha buddho eko, pathavi ekā,
anya-e1210n:1072_3: samuddo eko, sineru eko, devaloko eko, brahmaloko eko’ti cha ekakā milidappakaraṇe āgatā.
anya-e1210n:1073_0: Dve athavase sampassamānā bhagavatā vihāradānaṃ anuññātaṃ? Vihāradānaṃ nāma sabbabuddhehi
anya-e1210n:1073_1: vaṇṇitaṃ anumataṃ thomitaṃ pasathaṃ vihāradānaṃ davā devamanussā jātijarābyādhimaraṇehi
anya-e1210n:1073_2: muccissanti. Vihāre sati bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo vā katokāsā dassanakāmānaṃ sulabhadassanaṃ bhavissantī’ti.
anya-e1210n:1074_0: Dve athavase paṭicca sabbabuddhā attanā nimmitaṃ catupaccayaṃ na paribhuñjanti? Aggadakkhiṇeyyo
anya-e1210n:1074_1: sathā’ti bahū devamanussā catupaccayaṃ datvā dukkhā muccissanti. Buddhā paṭihāriyaṃ
anya-e1210n:1075: Dve akammajā ahetujā anutujā? Ākāso nibbānañcā’ti
anya-e1210n:1076: Dve athavase sampassamānena vessantarena raññā dve puttā dinnā? Dānapathova me na parihāyissati, ime kumārā mūlajalāhārabhuñjanadukkhato mucacissantī’ti.
anya-e1210n:1077: Udakassa dve guṇā nibbānaṃ anuppaviṭṭhā? Sītalabhāvo, pītassa ghammavinayanabhāvo cā’ti.
anya-e1210n:1078: Asatiyā ajānanena cā’ti dvīhi kāraṇehi āpattiṃ āpajjantī’ti cha dukā āgatā.
anya-e1210n:1079: Sītena uṇhena atibhojanenā’ti tīhi ākārehi pittaṃ kuppati.
anya-e1210n:1080: Sītena uṇhena annāpānena cā’ti tahī ākārehi semhaṃ kuppati.
anya-e1210n:1081: Buddhavaṃsatāya dhammagarukatāya bhikkhubhumimahantatāyā’ti tīhi kāraṇehi pātimokkhaṃ paṭicchannaṃ kārāpeti.
anya-e1210n:1082: Agadassa tayo guṇā nibbānaṃ anuppaviṭṭhā? Gilānakānaṃ parisaraṇaṃ rogavināsanaṃ amatakaraṇanti.
anya-e1210n:1083: Maṇiratanassa tayo guṇā nibbānaṃ anuppaviṭṭhā? Sabbakāmadadaṃ nahāsakaraṃ ujjotathakaranti.
anya-e1210n:1084: Ratanacadanassa tayo guṇā? Vaṇṇasampanno gadhasampanno rasasampanno’ti satta tikā vuttā.
anya-e1210n:1085_0: Sappimaṇḍassa tayo guṇā? Vaṇṇasamapanno, gadhasampanno, rasasampanno’ti sattatikā
anya-e1210n:1085_2: ime cattāro athavase sampassamānā buddhā paṭisallānaṃ sevanti.
anya-e1210n:1086: Ninnatāya dvāratāya ciṇṇatāya samudācaritattāti catuhi ākārehi manoviññāṇaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇe anupavattati.
anya-e1210n:1087: Kammavasena yonivasena kulavasena āyācanavasenā’ti catunnaṃ sannipātānaṃ vasena gabbhassāvakkanti hoti.
anya-e1210n:1088_0: Adiṭṭhantarāyo, uddissakatassa antarāyo, upakkhaṭantarāyo paribhogantarāyo’ti cattāro
anya-e1210n:1088_1: antarāyā tesu adiṭṭhantarāyo bhagavato athi, sesā tayo nathi, uddissakatassa byāmappabhāya
anya-e1210n:1089_0: Abbhā, mahikā, megho, rāhu cā’ti cattāro sūriyarogā samuddasasa cattāro guṇā? Kuṇapehi
anya-e1210n:1089_1: asaṃvāsiyabhāvo, nadīhi apūraṇatā, mahābhutāvāsatā, vicittapupphasamākiṇṇatā’ti.Satta catukkā vuttā.
anya-e1210n:1090: 5. Bhumimahantatā, parisuddhavimalatā, pāpehiasaṃvāsiyatā, duppaṭivijjhatā, bahuvidhasaṃvararakkhiyatā’ti sāsanassa ime atulyā pañca guṇā vattanti pakāsanti.
anya-e1210n:1091: Bhojanassa pañca guṇā nibbānaṃ anuppaviṭṭhā? Accuggatatā, acalatā duradhirohaṇatā bījārūhaṇatā kopānunayavivajjanatā’ti.
anya-e1210n:1092: Āhaccapadena rasena ācariyavaṃsatāya adhippāyākāratāya ñāṇuttaratāyā’ti imehi pañcaguṇehi atho paṭiggahetabbo cā’ti cattāro pañcakā vuttā.
anya-e1210n:1093_0: 6. Senāpati, purohito, akkhadasso, bhaṇḍāgāriko, chattagāho, khaggagāho amacco’ti
anya-e1210n:1093_1: cha amaccā gaṇīyanti. Vepullo rājagahiyānaṃ buddho aggo pavuccatī’ti cha aggā. Māṇavagāmikadevaputtena
anya-e1210n:1094: Vātiko, pittiko, semhiko, devatūpasaṃhārato, samudāciṇṇato, pubbanimittato’ti cha janā supinaṃpassantī’ti tayo chakkā vuttā.
anya-e1210n:1095: 7. Puthujjanacittaṃ, sotāpannacittaṃ, sakadāgāmicittaṃ, anāgāmicittaṃ, arahantacittaṃ, paccekabuddhacittaṃ, sammāsambuddhacittanti satta cittavimuttiyo.
anya-e1210n:1096: Nārado, dhammantarī, aṃgīraso, kapilo, kaṇḍaraggisāmo, atulo, pubbakaccāyano’ti satta ācariyā ovādakārakā.
anya-e1210n:1099: Ime satta janā akālamaraṇikā nāmā’ti tayo sattakā vuttā.
anya-e1210n:1100: 8. Visamaṃ sabhayaṃ …pe… aṭṭhete parivajjiyā’ti imāni aṭṭhaṭṭhānāni paṇḍitehi parivajjanīyānīti parivajjanīyaṭṭhānaṭṭhakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1101: Rattoduṭṭho …pe… ete athavināsakā’ti idaṃ athavināsakaṭṭhakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1102: Vasena yasapucchāhi …pe… tesaṃ buddhi pabhijjatī’ti idaṃ buddhivisadakaraṇaṭṭhakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1103: Kālaṃ desaṃ dīpaṃ kulaṃ janettimāyuṃ māsaṃ nekkhammaṃ viloketī’ti idaṃ bodhisattena vilokiyaṭṭhakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1109: Ete aṭṭha anāgate aṭṭha janā vilokiyā”ti;
anya-e1210n:1111: Ratto duṭṭho’ca mūḷho ca mānī luddho tathā’laso rājā ca ghātakā aṭṭha nāgasenena desitā’tiidaṃ ghātakaṭṭhakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1112: Vāta pittena semhena …pe… akāle tatha viyyatī’ti idaṃ akālamaraṇakāraṇaṭṭhakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1113_0: Na vā atho anusāsitabbo, na rāgupasaṃhitaṃ cittaṃ na dosūpasaṃhitaṃ cittaṃ na mohūpasaṃhitaṃ
anya-e1210n:1113_1: cittaṃ upaṭṭhāpetabbaṃ, dāsakammakaraporisesu nīcavuttinā bhavitabbaṃ, kāyikavācasikaṃ
anya-e1210n:1113_2: suṭṭhu rakkhitabbaṃ, chaḷidriyāni suṭṭhū rakkhitabbāni, mettābhāvanāya mānasaṃ upaṭṭhāpetabbanti
anya-e1210n:1113_3: idaṃ raññā milidena samādinnaṃ vattaṭṭhakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1114: Pupphāpaṇaṃ gadhāpanaṃ phalāpaṇaṃ agadāpaṇaṃ osadhāpaṇaṃ amatāpaṇaṃ ratanāpaṇaṃ sabbāpaṇanti idaṃ āpaṇaṭṭhakaṃ nāmā’ti. Dasa aṭṭhakā vuttā.
anya-e1210n:1115: 9.’Ratto duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca …pe… khippaṃ bhavati pākaṭanti’ idaṃ ittaranavakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1125: Gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhu mahī sidhu sarassatī vetravatī vitathā cadabhāgā’tī idaṃnadidasakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1126: Sītaṃ uṇhaṃ jighacchā pipāsā uccāro passāvo thinamiddhaṃ jarā byādhi maraṇanti idaṃ kāyānuvattakadasakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1127_0: Buddhe sagāravo, dhamme sagāravo, saṅghe sagāravo, sabrahmacārisu sagāravo, uddesaparipucchāsu
anya-e1210n:1127_1: vāyamati, savaṇabahulo hoti, bhinnasīlo’pi ākappaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, garahabhayā kāyikavācasikañcassa
anya-e1210n:1127_2: surakkhitaṃ hoti, padhānābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ hoti, karontopi pāpaṃ paṭicchannaṃ ācaratī’ti
anya-e1210n:1128_3: uposathasamādānato dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetī’ti ekantojudiṭṭhitāya uposathasamādānato dakkhiṇaṃ
anya-e1210n:1128_4: visodhetī’ti ekantojudiṭṭhitāya uposathasamādānato dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetī’ti idaṃ dakkhiṇāvasena dasakaṃ nāma.
