anya-e1210n:1129: Alagganatā, nirālayatā, vāgo, pahāṇaṃ, apunarāvattitā, sukhumatā, mahantatā, duranubodhatā, dullabhatā asadisatā, buddhadhammassā’ti idaṃ bodhisattaguṇadasakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1130_0: Majjajadānaṃ, samajjadānaṃ, ithidāṃ, asabhadānaṃ, cittakammadānaṃ, visadānaṃ, sathadānaṃ,
anya-e1210n:1130_1: saṅkhalikadānaṃ, kukkuṭasūkaradānaṃ, tulākūṭa mānanakūṭadānananti idaṃ loke adānasammatadānaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1131_0: Mātā badhanaṃ, pitā badhanaṃ, bhariyā badhanaṃ, puttā badhanaṃ, ñātī badhanaṃ, mittābadhanaṃ,
anya-e1210n:1131_1: dhanaṃ badhanaṃ, lābhasakkārobadhanaṃ, issariyaṃ badhanaṃ, pañcakāmaguṇā badhananti
anya-e1210n:1132_0: Vidhavā ithi, dubbalo puggalo, amittañātipuggalo, mahagghaso, anācāriyakulavāsī,
anya-e1210n:1132_1: pāpamitto, dhanahīno, ācariyahīno, kammahīno, payogahīno puggalo’ti idaṃ oñātabbapuggaladasakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1133: Dame same khantisaṃvare yame niyame akkodhe vihiṃsāya sacce soceyye’ti dasaṭṭhānesu satataṃ cittaṃ pavattatī’ti idaṃ vessantaraguṇadasakaṃ nāmā’ti.
anya-e1210n:1135_0: 11. Ākāsassa ekādasa guṇā nibbānaṃ anuppaviṭṭhā? Na jāyati, najiyyati, na miyyati,
anya-e1210n:1135_1: na cavati, na uppajjati, duppasayho, acoraharaṇo, anissito, vihaṅgagamano, nirāvaraṇo,
anya-e1210n:1136: Sīlapākāraṃ …pe… satipaṭṭhānavīthikanti idaṃ dhammanagaraparivārekādasakaṃ nāmā’ti dve ekādasakā vuttā.
anya-e1210n:1137_0: 12. Ratto rāgavasena apacitiṃ na karoti, duṭṭho dosavasena, mūḷho mohavasena, unnaḷomānavasena,
anya-e1210n:1137_1: nigguṇo avisesatāya, atithaddho atisedhatāya, hīno hīnabhāvatāya,vacanakaro anissaratāya,
anya-e1210n:1137_2: pāpo kadariyatāya, dukkhāpito dukkhāpitatāya, luddho lobhavasena, āyūhito athasādhanavasena
anya-e1210n:1137_3: apacitiṃ na karotīti idaṃ apacitiakārakapuggaladvādasakaṃ nāma ekameva āgataṃ.
anya-e1210n:1138_2: sosānikaṅgaṃ yathāsathatikaṅgaṃ nesajajikaṅganti idaṃ dhutaṅgaterasakaṃ nāma ekameva.
anya-e1210n:1140_3: kesesu lūyantesu socanti kilamanti paridevanti urattāḷiṃ kadanti sammohaṃ āpajjantīti
anya-e1210n:1141_0: Tiracchanagato peto micchādiṭṭhito kuhako mātughātako pitughātako arahantaghātako
anya-e1210n:1141_1: lohituppādako saṅghabhedako tithiyapakkantako theyyasaṃvāsako bhikkhunīdūsako terasannaṃ
anya-e1210n:1141_2: garukāpattīnaṃ aññataraṃ āpajjivā avuṭṭhito paṇḍako, ubhatobyañjanako, ūnasattavassako’ti
anya-e1210n:1142_0: 17. Abhijānato sati uppajjati kaṭumikāya, oḷārikaviññāṇato hitaviññāṇato ahitaviññāṇato
anya-e1210n:1142_1: sabhāganimittato vīsabhāganimittato kathābhiñañāṇato lakkhaṇato saraṇato muddato
anya-e1210n:1142_2: gaṇanāto dhāraṇato bhāvanato potthakanibadhanato upanikkhepato anubhutato sati uppajjatīti
anya-e1210n:1144_0: 19. Suti sumuti saṃkhyayogā ñāyavesesikā gaṇitā gadhabbā tikicchā catubbedā purāṇā
anya-e1210n:1144_1: itihāsajotisā māyā hetu mantanā yuddhā chadasā buddhavacanena ekūnavīsatīti idaṃ
anya-e1210n:1145_0: 22. Aggo yamo seṭṭho niyamo hāro vihāro saṃyamo saṃvaro khanti soraccaṃ ekantacariyā
anya-e1210n:1145_1: ekattābhirati paṭisallānaṃ hiri ottappaṃ vīriyaṃ appamādo sikkhāpadānaṃ uddeso paripucchā
anya-e1210n:1145_2: sīlādiabhirati nirālayatā sikkhāpadapāripūritāti bāvīsatisamaṇakaraṇā dhammā kāsāvadhāraṇaṃ
anya-e1210n:1145_3: bhaṇḍubhāvo cā’ti dve liṅgāni pakkhipivā vadanakāraṇaguṇabāvīsatikaṃ.
anya-e1210n:1146_0: 25. Ārakkhā sevanā ceva pamattappamattā tathā seyyāvakāso gelaññaṃ bhojanaṃ labbhakañceva
anya-e1210n:1146_1: viseso ca vijāniyā pattabhattaṃ saṃvibhaje assāso ca paṭicāro gāmaviharaṃ cārā be
anya-e1210n:1146_2: sallāpo pana kātabbo chiddaṃ disvā khameyya ca sakkaccākhaṇḍakārī dve arahassāsesakāri
anya-e1210n:1146_3: dve janeyya janakaṃ cittaṃ vaḍḍhicitataṃ janeyya ca sikkhābale ṭhapeyya naṃ mettaṃ
anya-e1210n:1146_4: cittañca bhāvaye. Na jahe apadāya ca karaṇīye ca ussukaṃ paggahe khalikaṃ dhamme.
anya-e1210n:1146_5: Iti paṃcavīsa guṇāmilidena pakāsitā’ti idaṃ antevāsikamhi ācariyena kataguṇapaṃcavīsatikaṃ
anya-e1210n:1147_0: Kodho upanāho makkho palāso issā macchariyaṃ māyā sāṭheyyaṃ thamho sāramho māno atimāno
anya-e1210n:1147_1: mado pamādo thinamiddhaṃ nadi ālasyaṃ pāpamittatā rūpā saddā gadhā rasā phoṭṭhabbā
anya-e1210n:1147_2: budhā pipāsā aratīti idaṃ cittadubbalīkaraṇadhammapañcavīsatikanti dve pañcavīsatikā vuttā.
anya-e1210n:1148_0: 28. Paṭisallānaṃ paṭisalliyamānaṃ puggalaṃ rakkhati. Āyuṃ vaḍḍheti, balaṃ vaḍḍheti,
anya-e1210n:1148_1: vajjaṃ pidahati, ayasaṃ apaneti, yasaṃ upadahati, aratiṃ apaneti, ratiṃ upadahati,
anya-e1210n:1148_2: bhayaṃ apaneti, vesārajjaṃ karoti, kosajjaṃ apaneti, vīriyaṃ abhijaneti, rāgaṃ apaneti,
anya-e1210n:1148_3: dosaṃ apaneti, mohaṃ apaneti, mānaṃ nihanti, vitakkaṃ bhañjati, cittamekaggaṃ karoti,
anya-e1210n:1148_4: mānasaṃ sinehayati, hāsaṃabhijaneti, garukaṃkaroti, mānaṃ uppādayati, namassiyaṃ
anya-e1210n:1148_5: karoti, pītiṃ pāpeti, pāmojjaṃ karoti, saṅkhārānaṃ sabhāvaṃ dassayati, bhavapaṭisadhiṃ
anya-e1210n:1149_0: Mahosadho mahārāja sūro, hirimā, ottāpī, sapakkho, mittasampanno, khamo, sīlavā,
anya-e1210n:1149_1: saccavādī, soceyyasampanno, akodhano, anatimānī, anusūyako, vīriyavā, āyūhako, saṅgāhako,
anya-e1210n:1149_2: saṃvibhāgī, sakhilo, nivātavutti, asaṭho, amāyāvī, buddhisampanno, kittimā, vijjāsampanno,
anya-e1210n:1149_3: hitesī upanissitānaṃ, abhirūpo dassanīyo, pathito sabbajanassa, dhanavā yasavā’ti
anya-e1210n:1149_4: idaṃ mahosadhaguṇaṭṭhavīsatikaṃ iti dve aṭṭhavīsatikā vuttā.
anya-e1210n:1150_0: 30. Imehi terasahi dhutaguṇehi pubbe āsevitehi nisevitehi ciṇṇehi pariciṇṇehi caritehi
anya-e1210n:1150_1: paripūritehi nimittabhūtehi ariyasāvako idha bhave tiṃsaguṇavarehi samupeto hoti
anya-e1210n:1150_3: hoti, hatanihatamānadappo hoti, acaladaḷhaniviṭṭhanibbematikasaddho hoti, paripuṇṇa-pīṇita.
anya-e1210n:1150_5: hoti, devamanussānaṃ piyo hoti manāpo, khīṇāsava-ariyapuggala-pathito hoti, devamanussānaṃ
anya-e1210n:1150_6: vaditapūjito thutathavitathomitapasatho, idha vā huraṃ vā lokena anupalitto, appathokavajje’pi
anya-e1210n:1150_9: akuppadhammo, ahīnītavāso, anavajjabhogī, gativimutto, uttiṇṇasabbavicikiccho, vimuttijjhāyitatto,
anya-e1210n:1151_0: Jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, byādhipi dukkho, maraṇampi dukkhaṃ, sokopi paridevopi
anya-e1210n:1151_1: dukkho,upāyāsopi appiyehi sampayogopi piyehi vippayogopi, mātumaraṇampi pitumaraṇampi
anya-e1210n:1151_2: bhātumaraṇampi bhaginimaraṇampi ñātimaraṇampi ñātibyasanampi bhogavyasanampi sīlabyasanampi
anya-e1210n:1151_3: diṭṭhibyasanampi rājabyasanampi corabyasanampi veribhayampi dubbhikkhabhayampi aggibhayampi
anya-e1210n:1151_4: dukkhaṃ, udakabhayampi dukkhaṃ, ūmibhayampi āvaṭṭabhayampi kumbhīlabhayampi suṃsumārabhayampi
anya-e1210n:1151_6: parisasārajjabhayampi ājīvikabhayampi maraṇabhayampi mahābhayampi vettehi tāḷanampi
anya-e1210n:1151_7: kasāhi tāḷanampi aḍḍhadaṇḍakehi tāḷanampi hathacchedampi pādacchedampi nāsacchedampi
anya-e1210n:1151_9: jotimalikampi hathapajjotikampi erakavattikampi cīrakavāsikampi eneyyakampi balisamaṃsikampi
anya-e1210n:1151_11: telena osiñcanampi sunakhehi khādāpanampi jīvasūlāropaṇampi asināsīsacchedanampīti
anya-e1210n:1152_0: Saṅkhamuṇḍakanti saṅkhamuṇḍakammakaraṇaṃ taṃ karontā uttaroṭṭhassa ubhayato kaṇṇacūḷikagalavāṭakaparicchedena
anya-e1210n:1152_1: cammaṃ chidivā sabbakese ekato gaṇṭhiṃ kavā daṇḍakena veḍhavā uppāṭenti saha kesehi
anya-e1210n:1152_2: cammaṃ uṭṭhahati tato sīsakaṭāhaṃthūlasakkharāhi ghaṃsivā dhovantā saṅkhavaṇṇaṃ karonti.
anya-e1210n:1153_0: Tatha biḷaṅgathālikanti kañjiyokkhalikakammakaraṇaṃ. Taṃ karontā sisakaṭāhaṃ uppāṭevā
anya-e1210n:1153_1: tattaṃ ayoguḷaṃ saṇḍāsena gahevā tatha pakkhipanti. Tena mathaluṅgaṃ pakkaṭhivā upari uttarati.
anya-e1210n:1154: Rāhumukhanti rāhumukhakammakaraṇaṃ. Taṃ karontā saṅkunā vivarivā antomukhe dīpaṃ jālenti. Kaṇṇacūḷikāhi vā paṭṭhāya mukhaṃ nikhādanena khaṇanti lohitaṃpaggharivā mukhaṃ pūreti.
anya-e1210n:1157_0: Erakavattikanti erakavattakammakaraṇaṃ. Taṃ karontā heṭṭhāgivato paṭṭhāya cammavaṭṭe
anya-e1210n:1157_1: kantantā gopphake pātentī atha naṃ yottehi badhivā kaḍḍhanti. So attano’vacammavaṭṭe
anya-e1210n:1157_2: akkamivā patati cīrakavāsikanti cirakavāsikakammakaraṇaṃ. Taṃ karontā tatheva cammavaṭṭe
anya-e1210n:1157_3: kantivā kaṭiyaṃ ṭhapenti. Kaṭito paṭṭhāya kantivāgopphakesu ṭhapenti. Uparimehi heṭṭhimasarīraṃ
anya-e1210n:1158_0: Eṇeyyakanti eṇeyyakakammakaraṇaṃ. Taṃ karontā uhosu kapparesu ca jaṇṇukesu ca ayasalākayo
anya-e1210n:1158_1: davā ayasūlāni koṭṭenti. So catuhi ayayulehi bhumiyaṃ patiṭṭhahati. Atha naṃ parivārevā
anya-e1210n:1158_2: aggiṃ karonti. Taṃ sadhisadhito sūlāni apanovā catuhi aṭṭhikoṭīhiyeva ṭhapenti.
anya-e1210n:1160: Kahāpaṇakanti sakala sarīraṃ tiṇhāhi vāsīhi koṭito paṭṭhāya kahāpaṇa mattaṃ kahāpaṇa mattaṃ pātentā koṭṭenti.
anya-e1210n:1161: Khārāpatacchikanti sarīraṃ tatha tatha āvudhehi paharivā kocchehi khāraṃ saṃsenti cammamaṃsanahārūni paggharivā aṭṭhakasaṅkhalikā’va tiṭṭhati.
anya-e1210n:1162: Paḷighaparivattakatī ekena passena nipajjāpevā kaṇṇaṇacchidde ayasūlaṃ koṭṭevā pathaviyā ekabaddhaṃ karonti atha naṃ pāde gahevā āvijjhanti.
anya-e1210n:1163_0: Palālapīṭhikanti cheko kāraṇiko chavicammaṃ acchidivā nisadapotakehi aṭṭhini bhidivākesakalāpe
anya-e1210n:1163_1: gahevā ukkhipanti. Maṃsarāsiyeva hoti. Atha naṃ keseheva pariyonadhivā gaṇhanti palālavaṭṭiṃ
anya-e1210n:1164: Imañca saṭṭhividhaṃ dukkhaṃ sallakkhevā bhavesu nibbidivā virajjivā bhavataṇhaṃ pahāvā dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhānupassanā ñāṇena passitabbanti.
anya-e1210n:1165: Diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasatanti pañcasattati sekhiye apanevā sesānaṃ vasena diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṃ veditabbanti.
anya-e1210n:1167: Caturādhikasatesu gahetabbathesu pana catuttiṃsa ekathānī, catuttiṃsa dveyathāni soḷasa tyathāni, paṃca caturathāni, terasa pañcathāni, dve sattathānī’ti.
anya-e1210n:1181_3: vādīvarena mahākavinā suvipulavimalabuddhinā mahātipiṭaka- cūḷābhayathero’ti garūhi
